description: Raft: The Last Maverick – an original story-driven free survival game brought to you by Pride Games Studio, the well-proven survival genre masters. A new action adventure from the creators of Survival Island: Evolved will take you on a ride to the deep ocean waters set in a beautiful steampunk open world. You find yourself as a lone survivor on a raft amidst the endless waters of the Pacific, having to survive bloodthirsty sharks and underwater predators along with hunger, thirst and exhaustion. Explore tropical islands and hidden dungeons, gather resources, craft weapons and armor, upgrade your raft and evolve your hero – fight for your survival! Raft: The Last Maverick brings the survival simulator games to the new level of realism, engagement and fun.Craft! Evolve! Survive! * Survival of the fittest! Do your best to survive – design and upgrade a unique raft and turn it into real shelter. Explore the ocean for useful materials, craft new armor and weapons to fight off primal predators, hunt for food and learn to produce fresh water. Dive into action – everything you do will increase the chances of your survival.* Pimp your Raft! Start with just a small patch of wood that barely keeps your survivor afloat and build, build, build! First set up beds and chairs, then create furnace, workbench, water purifier and tons more of useful constructions. Evolve your building skills well enough and your hero will craft almost anything, even a real ballista to protect your shelter! An impenetrable steampunk fortress or a glamorous hotel with an ocean view – Craft your Raft until it makes you Daft! * The Lord of the Skills! As your hero ventures further into the ocean, you’ll witness him grow, develop and become stronger with each action taken and new level achieved. Let your survivor evolve from a green sailor-boy to the real Pacific Terror! * Blazing Guns of Captain Hook! The endless ocean not only offers stunning views but also holds many dangers. To keep enemies at bay Raft: The Last Maverick gives you a vast arsenal of guns, melee weapons and other means to defend your floating shelter. If you run out of anything, the trusty hook will always come in handy to reach far off crafting and building materials without the need to roleplay as a shark bait! * Raft Fiction! Follow the enticing story of The Last Maverick. Complete quests, look for other survivors, face brutal betrayals and bizarre plot-twists, form strong bonds with unlikely allies and craft your own destiny. Put all your strength to achieve the final goal – reaching the New World. If you play your cards right and manage to survive long enough you’ll be the one to uncover the mystery behind the unfortunate shipwreck. What at first seemed as just a coincidence might turn out into the meanest deception the steampunk world has seen! * Three men in a Raft! Multiplayer mode coming soon! Once you feel confident in your skills and evolve past the beginners point, you’ll be ready to join forces with your friends online to add even more brutal action to your adventure. Team up with other players online in the multiplayer mode, decide if you wish to save them from starvation or rob them of their last means for survival. Multiplayer will bring a new thrill even to the most weathered Heroes of the ocean!Join us: https://www.facebook.com/thelastmaverickgame

comments: Been playing game for couple of days, enjoying it so far. Lots to do, build times not to long at start, graphics good. Love the fact that in game purchases are there if you want them but you are not pushed to buy. Game plays well on my Samsung tablet and LG phone. Been playing for months now, still love it, definately not a play to win if you get into a good alliance

The usual city builder game that's easy to build up your castle/city way faster than it's other counterparts. The people I've met on this game were pretty kind, the battle simulating is a nice touch which I haven't seen anywhere else. Sad that I only get to see like 3/4 models of the same monsters though.

After playing mobile strike for a solid year, that game is really expensive if you want to be at the top with the big dogs. And this game seems great to where you don't have to spend much and actually enjoy the game. The graphics on her are amazing. I would suggest playing this game to all. 👍👊

This is a war game where no one wants ts to fight. Don't try attacking anyone bigger than you. They won't fight you back, they will just attack your buildings, which you won't be able to defend. It costs real money to avoid having them destroyed. Spend your time and money somewhere else.

When I first downloaded it promised you didn't need to pay to win and that hackers would be felt with - that was a lie. If your not prepared to spend a lot of money your just going to get wiped out by those who do or their hacker friends. comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

I have a problem with my account. My punk zombird was maxed out. Level 3. Then when I opened the game, my punk zombird was gone... I obtained that by waiting patiently and gathering 90 diamonds. I had to watch 3 15-30 sec long video for 2 diamonds each. After watching the 3 vids, I had to wait another 8 hours for it to be available again. It took me a month to obtain that bird and then all of a sudden it dissapears?! I obtained it again but I had to start all over again. I uninstalled this app because of that issue.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy 💎 gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyone💖 you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

description: My name is Bella Olsen. I turned into a vampire after a car accident. I kept my secret and went back to school. Later, I dated a new classmate, his name is Zac, and I found out that he is a vampire, too!Things got different after that. My ex-boyfriend, Spencer, came back to town and wanted to get back together with me. I never could imagine that his true identity is —— a werewolf!And that's not all, a new girl showed up at school, her name is Vicki. She asked me about Zac. I brought Vicki to Zac's home, and she told me that they had a relationship for a hundred years!A hundred years? Does Zac have another girlfriend behind my back? Is Vicki a vampire, too? I need to find out the truth.Features:- Let's light up the room! Clean up the spider webs! Wow, it’s a secret old house behind our high school!- Zac and Vicki are disappeared, the house is scary. Help Bella to open all the rooms in the house!- The first room is a dressing room! Wow, look at all the vintage jewelry! Look, a piece of an old photo is there!- The second room is a study room. Fix the lamb, sort out the book shelf, change the old sofa cushions! Wow, some more pieces of the old photo are here! And also an old diary!- Bella finds a diary here! There’s a sketch of a young couple in the diary, it says “Z&V, 1918”. What was happening here one hundred years ago?- Bella is so upset. The photo and diary, maybe Vicki really is Zac's girlfriend! But the date says 1918, and that was a hundred years ago. Zac is a vampire, he can live eternally, is Vicki a vampire, too?- The third room is a bathroom. Bella’s hair and face are covered by the dust, let us help her to freshen up a little bit! - Oh no! Bella uses a silver comb to brush her hair, she turns into a vampire!- The last room is a bedroom! Zac is here! Somebody attacked him! He is very weak at the moment, please save him!And so much more are waiting for you to find out at SECRET HIGH SCHOOL!Wanna have more fun? We would love to hear from you!Find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/Beauty-Salon-Games-1094161030602834/For more information about Beauty Salon Games, please visit http://www.beautysalongames.net/
descriptionHTML:
My name is Bella Olsen. I turned into a vampire after a car accident. I kept my secret and went back to school. Later, I dated a new classmate, his name is Zac, and I found out that he is a vampire, too!

Things got different after that. My ex-boyfriend, Spencer, came back to town and wanted to get back together with me. I never could imagine that his true identity is —— a werewolf!

And that's not all, a new girl showed up at school, her name is Vicki. She asked me about Zac. I brought Vicki to Zac's home, and she told me that they had a relationship for a hundred years!

A hundred years? Does Zac have another girlfriend behind my back? Is Vicki a vampire, too? I need to find out the truth.


Features:
- Let's light up the room! Clean up the spider webs! Wow, it’s a secret old house behind our high school!
- Zac and Vicki are disappeared, the house is scary. Help Bella to open all the rooms in the house!
- The first room is a dressing room! Wow, look at all the vintage jewelry! Look, a piece of an old photo is there!
- The second room is a study room. Fix the lamb, sort out the book shelf, change the old sofa cushions! Wow, some more pieces of the old photo are here! And also an old diary!
- Bella finds a diary here! There’s a sketch of a young couple in the diary, it says “Z&V, 1918”. What was happening here one hundred years ago?
- Bella is so upset. The photo and diary, maybe Vicki really is Zac's girlfriend! But the date says 1918, and that was a hundred years ago. Zac is a vampire, he can live eternally, is Vicki a vampire, too?
- The third room is a bathroom. Bella’s hair and face are covered by the dust, let us help her to freshen up a little bit!
- Oh no! Bella uses a silver comb to brush her hair, she turns into a vampire!
- The last room is a bedroom! Zac is here! Somebody attacked him! He is very weak at the moment, please save him!

And so much more are waiting for you to find out at SECRET HIGH SCHOOL!

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school! Features: 7 paintbrush colors 7 paint tin colors 39 character and prop stickers 10 animated stickers 6 magical drawing tools 3 Peppa backgrounds 3 characters to color in Eraser Choose to play with Peppa or George Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school Save your drawing to camera roll No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!

comments: The game was fine for 4 days. Do understand that that is maybe 40 min game play as it is so restricted. However it was a nice enough game that I was prepared to work with that. Today it has a bug, it requires me to click a certain button to continue, a button which is not onscreen. No way to proceed. Contacted WB and was told to file a report. Filed a report and the reply was you will not receive and answer.....well that's an unusual approach to customer service. I now have no option but to uninstall.  I could install it again, but really is there any reason to believe it won't have more similar issues?

Beautiful hidden object experience. Offers a variety of gameplay including mirrored levels, timed levels, and spot the differences. The Facebook connection is there without being thrown in your face like some other games and is a nice subtle addition. It does work off of energy however I am willing to stick it out just for the storyline.

It's a good game but having to wait so long for the energy build up takes away the excitement of the game play. Iv noticed alot of other game users have the same outlook on this game. Even the timers for tasks take way to long.. 6 hours to complete? Really? Why so long? People will get bored and find another stimulating game. This is based on the whole wizarding world so it should be alot more magical and less time consuming.

Love the game overall but it takes way too long to build up energy. Because of this you are only able to play for very short periods of time before you have to wait for the energy to build back up. Also some of the 'inspection' actions take way too long. Waiting 6+ hours for an action to be completed is excessive. I would love to be able to play the game for more than just a couple of minutes a day. I realize it is done to encourage people to make in app purchases, however, perhaps you could provide a paid version of the app to avoid this. I love the game and would love to be able to play it more.

Very entertaining game, but only for brief intervals unless you pay actual money. Your energy supply is drained with every scene you search. Each scene has to be searched multiple times to advance the story, and the energy is slow to replenish, so a lot of waiting is involved after short bursts of game time. Still, quite an enjoyable game for Potter fans and hidden object lovers.

Love this game, but it has only 14 cases!! WTH?? The last case acted like you were going on to another one, but no. Feel like it shouldn't have been released with only 14 cases. Very similar to Criminal Case in a lot of ways. The upgrades help a lot, but it takes a while before you notice their effect and cost is too high, IMO.
description: Fantastic Beasts™: Cases From The Wizarding WorldMaster your magical skills as you delve into your wizarding world to investigate unexplained happenings. In an new adventure inspired by J.K. Rowling’s Wizarding World, enjoy all-new experiences as you discover hidden objects, interview witnesses, analyze evidence, and cast spells to uncover and protect the magical creatures at the center of every mysterious case.Solve All-New Magical MysteriesClues to unlocking the secrets of your wizarding world are hiding in plain sight. Only you have the skills and talent to find the answers as you dive into the elusive world of magical creatures. You’ll cast spells, brew potions and decipher hidden clues to investigate and solve all-new mysteries.Help the Ministry of MagicThe Ministry of Magic is relying on you to crack the case as one of the brightest new recruits of the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures. description: Space Rabbits in Space is an award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed specifically for touch screens. No autorun and no virtual joysticks. Precise and highly responsive controls.Meet the Space Rabbits. Cute, fluffy bunnies from Space obsessed with speed and candies. Play with them through an adventure about betrayal, hard love and fun facts. With our new tap-based control system, you can move more freely, more precisely and faster than ever before - even faster than classic hardware controllers. It’s intuitive and easy to learn, hard to master... you know the drill. Play at your own pace or race against your friends or even the whole universe. It’s up to you.Don Padroncini, the infamous candy smuggler, has been sighted again. This time he is smuggling lumberjack equipment and defective gumball machines to the Copyrighted universe. The Intergalactic Authority on Everything sent Space Rabbits to stop him, but they fell into his trap. Or did they?FEATURES:• No auto run • No virtual joysticks• Precise and highly responsive controls done in a new and natural way. • Advanced movement techniques such as strafe jumping, wall sliding and ninja rope.• Play against your friends, region or the whole universe.• Watch replays of top 10 players on every level.• 40+ unique, fun and hand crafted levels.• Quirky outfits such as: Squatting Rabbits in Tracksuits, Disco Unicorn, Ninj0r and Little Red Rabbit Hood.
descriptionHTML:
Space Rabbits in Space is an award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed specifically for touch screens. No autorun and no virtual joysticks. Precise and highly responsive controls.

Meet the Space Rabbits. Cute, fluffy bunnies from Space obsessed with speed and candies. Play with them through an adventure about betrayal, hard love and fun facts.

With our new tap-based control system, you can move more freely, more precisely and faster than ever before - even faster than classic hardware controllers. It’s intuitive and easy to learn, hard to master... you know the drill.

Play at your own pace or race against your friends or even the whole universe. It’s up to you.

Don Padroncini, the infamous candy smuggler, has been sighted again. This time he is smuggling lumberjack equipment and defective gumball machines to the Copyrighted universe. The Intergalactic Authority on Everything sent Space Rabbits to stop him, but they fell into his trap. Or did they?

FEATURES:
• No auto run
• No virtual joysticks
• Precise and highly responsive controls done in a new and natural way.
• Advanced movement techniques such as strafe jumping, wall sliding and ninja rope.
• Play against your friends, region or the whole universe.
• Watch replays of top 10 players on every level.
• 40+ unique, fun and hand crafted levels.
• Quirky outfits such as: Squatting Rabbits in Tracksuits, Disco Unicorn, Ninj0r and Little Red Rabbit Hood.

340 S Lemon Ave 9714, Walnut, CA 91789
United States of America
summary: An award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed for touch screens.
title: Space Rabbits in Space

descriptionHTML:
Ready to drive big offroad trucks in one of the best 6x6 driving simulator games! Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads!
Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver!

!! Truck Driver 6x6 Hill Driving contains action packed 20 truck driving missions !!

Get right into the driving action and become the 6x6 truck driver, drive some seriously big vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!

Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators.
Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more...
Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a hill climb driving experience waiting for you.

Example of missions :
- Tow broke down 4x4 trucks offroad
- Transport important cargo across the country
- Race at speed to get through speed traps
- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs
- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV
- Protect your terrain from wolves
- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels
- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible
- And a whole load more!!

Features :
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests
- Realistic 6x6 truck driving simulator
- Realistic off-road truck driving physics
- High-quality 6x6 trucks and vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!
- Easy to play truck driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

descriptionHTML:
- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration - one of the best pixelated games in the first-person mode, time-tested! This game will not leave you indifferent and will present many interesting subjects and opportunities.

This game is created in the style of a sandbox with an open world, in which the player does not have any specific goals. You choose what to do in this game.

Explore the endless world of blocks and cubes. The most interesting war against zombies at night. Crafting and gathering, survival and building. And much much much more ...

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration provides the player with a three-dimensional generated world, entirely consisting of cubic blocks. This world you can freely rebuild, creating from the blocks of complex structures.

Features:

*** Easy operation and unrivaled interface
*** A lot of game modes of the game.
*** Numerous types of weapons for your taste.
*** Zombies and fighting with them.
*** The most diverse construction. Even more possibilities for creativity without limits.
*** Beautiful pixel graphics Super HD. Very beautiful texture in high resolution.
*** High FPS, without compromise.
*** For children and adults.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game has three modes.

Survival mode.
In this mode, you must extract natural resources (wood and stone, various minerals). Of these, you can build a variety of tools, blocks and elements. In the dark hours of the day there are dangerous monsters and zombies.

Creativity.
In this mode, you have unlimited access to all things, things, and building blocks. You can instantly destroy any blocks.

Multiplayer mode.
The name of this regime speaks for itself. Play with your friends and win.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game is developed by a professional team of developers with the involvement of design, rezhsure and sound specialists.

The pixel world is waiting for you!

comments: There's absolutely no way you're able to go through all the levels unless you spend money at some point or you just wait out the lives recount. It's a good freemium game, but don't bother redoing levels unless it's to earn more coins for essential upgrades. This game WILL take your money if you let it.

This game is soooo fun!! Its better than Cooking Fever. I love this game!❤ the levels get harder but that's the fun of it. And the food makes me really hungry🍔! But the thing is that after a few days (when i first got the game) it didn't let me play the game, it just stayed at 89 percent. So I got the game again but it still did it😭.

The game is fun when it works. Every time I unlock a new restaurant or a new region or bonus level or ANYTHING it won't download. I get a "connection error", and the only way to get past it is to delete the game, re-download EVERYTHING (which clocks in at over 100mb) and try again.

I loved this game until today so it gets 1 star. Too many glitches or prompts. Right after I spend money on in-app purchases in order to use during a stage, my game froze. Another time, a prompt for an update popped up as soon as I used an in-app purchase and froze the entire game. Keep in mind, I'd already been playing for a good while. I won't be spending any more money in this game and some levels are set up to where you'd have to spend so I guess I'll eventually be uninstalling. It's fun, addictive but glitchy and steals your money.

The game really very good.. it really liked concept nd i play it for hours.. but after unlocking paris I am facing difficulty to complete the levels.. even though i play efficiently some levels just cant be completed they require special add ons or purchases.. this makes game frustrating..even after giving my best i am not able to complete levels.. if its due to any error plz correct it asap otherwise i have to delete it coz i cant go any further in this game with this nd its frustrating me.. thank u

I want an explanation for not being able to win the gold ticket in level 100 in Rome. I have spent 3 bosters on it and is impossible to go trough no matter if i make 1000 or 3000 coins i wont win the gold ticket and i cant go forward because of it. You need to tell the players whats the criteria to win this tickets because it changes all the time. I have played several levels numerous times and it feels like you give the ticket whenever you feel like. 22 likes 22 customers and sometimes you have to play the same level 5 or 6 times doesnt seem right. Level 100 in Rome asked for 1500 coins i played got way more than that no gold ticket play second time and changes to 1650 i play again and no gold ticket go and play again and it is 1800 coins.  IMFORM YOUR PLAYERS OF THE CRITERIA TO WIN GOLD TICKETS.

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to take control of big rig trucks, 4x4 offroad trucks, and more in a huge forest and mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads to drive on!
Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver in one of the best truck driving simulators!

!! Truck Simulator 4x4 Offroad contains 20 action-packed truck driving levels !!

Drive all-new 4x4 trucks and grab hold of the steering wheel to experience truck driving simulators like never seen before. Experience the realistic truck driving in tough muddy hill climb sections, using 4x4 offroad driving, you can conquer driving 4x4 trucks in the most realistic truck simulator!

Explore a whole new massive open world map, filled with tons of beautiful vistas to explore in the best offroad truck simulator.
Drive up close to waterfall cascades and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping sites, and loads more...
Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a 4x4 offroad hill climb.

Play awesome missions like:
- Tow broke down 4x4 vehicles with your offroad truck
- Transport important cargo across the countryside
- Hill climb up muddy mountains with 4x4 offroad truck driving
- Race at high speed against offroad dune buggy racers
- Chase and pursue other 4x4 trucks in offroad pursuits
- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climb
- Stop and catch dangerous truck drivers
- Race against busy traffic and angry drivers
- Clear the roads by ramming objects with your offroad truck
- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible

Features:
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests
- Realistic 4x4 driving truck simulator
- Realistic off-road driving physics
- High-quality 4x4 vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

The physics of this game are terrible. It's fatal flaw is if you have a completely frozen rock, you physically can't remove it, but this game you can completely remove 3 rocks even if they are all frozen. Also the free guard rule is very loosley applied. This game clearly was not created by someone who has ever curled.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

comments: Too short of gameplay I saw DanTDM play this game on PC I think and it was pretty funny and it looked cool. I saw it on Google Play and bought it... I was preeeety disappointed. Don't waste your precious 30 seconds of gameplay time! There are just so many games out there that are better, even Flappy Bird. However, the funny fail screens make it only a bit better.

I downloaded this app, I started to play the game, it's was really funny and enjoyable! But the talking on the court was a little too long. It then showed me running and it said who made it, who was the director, the music and voices. Then it told me to press retry from start. It put me the whole way back. Please fix this problem and I will give you another start and if you do the things that other people do I will give five stars. Other than that it's amazing!

Wow It freezes up after one click.. and they changed on of the best background songs to trash because these people didn't create the game.. just tried to attempt it.  Then this weird pattern block got stuck on his head for the rest of the game and I lost interest...

While the game was fairly short, it was also very well done. I think many of the reviews saying it was boring or saying they "beat it in five minutes" didn't get the point of the game. The point of the game is more about seeing all the different possibilities rather than winning. For this reason it's mostly a matter of whether or not you enjoy the creator's sense of humor which I greatly enjoy. Nothing about this game is perfect, but nothing is bad either. All in all this is an awesome series of games.

description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around. • Play to discover all these wintertime features: • Skin-tones and blushes • Eye-lenses and eyebrows • Fabulous mascaras • Tons of glamorous eyeshadows• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors• Wintry face-paints• Icy tops• Necklaces and earrings• Beautiful hairstyles  • Wonderful tiaras So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

description: PLEASE NOTE: This app requires a Merge Cube and a smartphone or a tablet to play. To find out how to get a Merge Cube and to learn more, visit our website at: https://www.MergeCube.com. Follow the instructions carefully, because you’ll need to activate switches, push specific buttons, and cut the colored wires in order to defuse the holographic bomb as the clock counts down! Twist and turn the cube to find the correct panel as you follow the instructions to deactivate the bomb for each level, but don’t waste any time - the clock is ticking! As seen on VentureBeat, Wired, Wareable, Android Central, Huffington Post, and more.“Kids are gonna love this” - Hugh Langley, Wareable“The coolest surprise from CES.” - Russell Holly, Android Central“The [Merge Cube] stole my heart at Toy Fair 2017.” - Dan Nessell, Huffington PostHOW TO PLAY IN PHONE MODE (Without VR/AR Goggles)-Launch the app-Be sure to allow camera and photo access-Enter your activation code (found inside the cube packaging)-Enter an adult’s email address to create an account-Select Phone Mode -Play the tutorial within the app-Make sure you can see the cube through your phone-Hold your device with one hand and hold the cube with your other hand, or use the optional stand in the package-Defuse the bombs before time runs out!HOW TO PLAY IN VR MODE (With VR/AR Goggles)-Launch the app-Be sure to allow camera and photo access-Enter your activation code (found inside the cube packaging)-Enter an adult’s email address to create an account-Select VR/Merge Mode-Place your smartphone in your VR/AR goggles -Play the tutorial within the app-Make sure you can see the cube through your screen-Defuse the bombs before time runs out! If you have any questions or suggestions, we would love to hear from you! Contact us at any time at support@MergeVR.com.Are you a developer interested in creating experiences for the Merge Cube? Apply for a dev kit here: https://dev.mergevr.com/cubeABOUT MERGEWe're virtual and augmented reality specialists that push the boundaries of imagination, merging the physical and digital worlds to build toys, games, and universes that are fun, educational, accessible and appropriate for everyone, ages 10+. Learn more at www.MergeVR.com/aboutPrivacy Policy:https://mergevr.com/privacy-policyTerms of Use:https://mergevr.com/terms-of-use
descriptionHTML:
PLEASE NOTE: This app requires a Merge Cube and a smartphone or a tablet to play. To find out how to get a Merge Cube and to learn more, visit our website at: https://www.MergeCube.com.


Follow the instructions carefully, because you’ll need to activate switches, push specific buttons, and cut the colored wires in order to defuse the holographic bomb as the clock counts down! Twist and turn the cube to find the correct panel as you follow the instructions to deactivate the bomb for each level, but don’t waste any time - the clock is ticking!


As seen on VentureBeat, Wired, Wareable, Android Central, Huffington Post, and more.

“Kids are gonna love this” - Hugh Langley, Wareable

“The coolest surprise from CES.” - Russell Holly, Android Central

“The [Merge Cube] stole my heart at Toy Fair 2017.” - Dan Nessell, Huffington Post


HOW TO PLAY IN PHONE MODE (Without VR/AR Goggles)
-Launch the app
-Be sure to allow camera and photo access
-Enter your activation code (found inside the cube packaging)
-Enter an adult’s email address to create an account
-Select Phone Mode
-Play the tutorial within the app
-Make sure you can see the cube through your phone
-Hold your device with one hand and hold the cube with your other hand, or use the optional stand in the package
-Defuse the bombs before time runs out!


HOW TO PLAY IN VR MODE (With VR/AR Goggles)
-Launch the app
-Be sure to allow camera and photo access
-Enter your activation code (found inside the cube packaging)
-Enter an adult’s email address to create an account
-Select VR/Merge Mode
-Place your smartphone in your VR/AR goggles
-Play the tutorial within the app
-Make sure you can see the cube through your screen
-Defuse the bombs before time runs out!


If you have any questions or suggestions, we would love to hear from you! Contact us at any time at support@MergeVR.com.

Are you a developer interested in creating experiences for the Merge Cube? Apply for a dev kit here: https://dev.mergevr.com/cube


ABOUT MERGE
We're virtual and augmented reality specialists that push the boundaries of imagination, merging the physical and digital worlds to build toys, games, and universes that are fun, educational, accessible and appropriate for everyone, ages 10+. Learn more at www.MergeVR.com/about

description: Summer is coming! Get ready to help a lot of tourists on the beach, the bay or out in sea!The life of a coastguard hero can be really stressful. As a member of the coastguard, you need to protect the people around ocean and beach. Be prepared for all situations! Fire, swimmers in need and injured people. Can you help them? You need to control your helicopter and ambulance to help all the people. The ocean waves are really high today! Help tourists who go too deep into the sea with your coastguard helicopter. Help them from the beach with your SOS ambulance. After the rescue, you drive as fast as possible towards the hospital. Show us your coastguard skills in this tourist beach bay.  Many tourists like to ride jet ski in this tropical island resort. It is your job to keep an eye on them from your helicopter! Prepare for dangers and use your coastguard helicopter to save them. Transport them with your SOS ambulance to the nearest hospital. We need a Hero! Key Features:✔ Help people from the beach, from the bay and from fires!✔ Multiple SOS ambulances!✔ Multiple SOS Coastguard helicopter.✔ Watch over the ocean bay and beach from your coastguard headquarters!✔ More emergency helicopter simulator games and SOS ambulance simulator games coming soon! *** ANY IN GAME PURCHASE WILL REMOVE ADS FOREVER *** We’re on Twitter, Facebook and more - find us on your favorite networks to hear about our newest games and other news updates: ▶ Website | www.trimcogames.com▶ Facebook | www.facebook.com/TrimcoGames▶ Twitter | www.twitter.com/gamestrimco▶ YouTube | www.youtube.com/trimcogames

comments: Im really loving this game. I like. How you can help people but you dont have to befriend them. I like that you can update houses and building instead of selling and buying now. I do finding though that sometimes it's touchy and wants you to click a specific spot when collecting...which can be annoying. Oh i like that building aren't huge thus you dont run out of space right away.

This app still needs work.   The play is good and it is a fun game however there is too much that doesn't do anything on the app version.   Perhaps this should be a 'lite' version that doesn't allow you build things that don't work.   Other players are very helpful and informative.
It is really addicting :-)  I do wish there were a different way to get diamonds and it would be cool if I could rotate things around.. otherwise a great way to spend a winters day inside 😊
No much to play. You need diamonds to preatty much do anything.. 5 minutes playing per day won t get you anywhere close to what you need to complete the next task. Love the graphic thought.
New update makes it impossible to use app if you have more than one city without having to reboot every time.
The elven version of Forge of Empires, almost exactly the same tutorial but same slow paced. Nice game. Not my kind you of game. Happy gaming to those who play this game.
description: BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENARChoose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.CHOOSE YOUR RACEPlay as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fitSTART INSTANTLYCity building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active communityEXPLORE THE WORLDDiscover new provinces to expand your cityTRADE WITH FRIENDSTrade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplaceADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATIONUpgrade your buildings to supply your growing populationWELCOME NEW CREATURESCreate a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy racesElvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account. Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint

summary: Create a flourishing fantasy city and discover a magical world full of mysteries
title: Elvenar

comments: Bored? Got 10 minutes to kill? Download this! It's not a very long game but there's so many choices and combinations and even several ways to win. Also has pretty funny references. The prequel escape from prison is amusing but not as funny and the sequel infiltrate the airship is possibly better. Definitely worth a download

Cool but needs more endings It's a little awesome but for three endings, let's just say I played all the games in the series. but except braking the bank this is the lamest one. And im pretty sure that the greatball is a pokeball

I didn't think they could do much improving after that first game, but boy was I wrong! No Phoenix Wright included this time, but I'll forgive you. I got 37 out of the 40 possible endings, and am giving up because I don't think it's possible to get all 40. 😁 Oh well. Longer and better than the first. Get it, or die regretting your decision.

Apparently. some people don't understand how this game works. Its a series, its gonna be a short game to save time for the other games. This one guy said its not as good as fleeing the complex. Its not going to be as good as the newer games. This is an older game. That being said, this game is one of the best games i've played for mobile.

You tried too hard The jokes in this one isn't nearly as good as in Fleeing the Complex. You can do better than to insult me and my intellegence as a joke. Just because I want to see all the different endings doesn't make me stupid. I didn't take it personally but it gets annoying really.

comments: The graphics are nice, but the controls are very hard. Especially in a boat. I finally built a boat, but I couldn't go anywhere because the boat only went in one direction wherever I tried to steer. The pets are very helpful, but there are way too many ads. I placed a campfire down but later it disappeared. I can't move an object I placed, and I accidentally placed a campfire in front of my doorway and I couldn't destroy it nor move it. Changing the direction of furniture would be handy too because I couldn't fit the bed in my tiny house because I couldn't switch the direction it was facing. I also couldn't make more than one thing at a time. If I were to cook food in my oven, I had to wait because I couldn't make something in my workshop while something was cooking.

I really like this game, it's fun and addictive! One thing happened that I'm not to impressed with though. I got a pet elephant, but it disappeared and now has made everything harder once more. Could you please give me my pet elephant back.

I see a lot of other reviews dissing the adds for a *FREE* game (umm... Use cash for pixels and buy an ad free game then... Making games isn't easy and/or cheap and sponsorship {ads} is how it is funded... stop feeling entitled) My complaint is the lack of directives after initial survival is achieved and well I'm not a guy and would rather have a choice in gender. Fun but much underdeveloped. Love to see this built upon

I see a lot of reviews saying this game is boring. Well, kind of right and kind of wrong. It is tedious getting started but once you figure out what you want to do, this game is like most surviver games. You get resources, build stuff and kill animals. So if you are looking for an action packed kill em all experience, this game is not for you.

descriptionHTML:
You don’t remember how you got to this island, but now you’re stranded in the wild. Surviving here will be no simple task. First you’ll need to find food, craft some primitive tools, and build a shelter. Think you have what it takes? Your survival adventure is about to begin…

Game features:
*Explore the wilderness!
*Build your house from the ground up!
*Utilize an extensive crafting system with tons of recipes!
*Meet the island fauna!
*Island survival sandbox simulator.

Survivalist tips:
★Begin with chopping wood in the forest. Wood is used for craft.
★Craft armor and weapons for fighting wild animals.
★Don’t starve, survivor: collect all available resources to keep yourself fed.
★Craft everything you might need.
★Keep track of your health, or you won’t survive…

If you like other survival games, play Survival Island: Evolve – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Begin your survival adventure now!

*IMPORTANT. Online multiplayer is still in development and will be available soon. Follow our news feed to be the first to know when you can play with friends!

Another downside is the people in chats can be rude and inapropriate, as well as I had to to restart my phone twice so far because of lags and crashing. There have also been ads popping up at the top of the screen that were not suitable for me, such as a dating site, and I am eleven years old, and my suggestion for that is you don't have inapropriate ads like that in the future updates of the game. Ads also interrupt my gameplay, but that has not bothered me yet. Generally, however, it is a great game.

comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)

Pretty decent game, couple of suggestions though: instead of limiting lives to a paywall, why not use opt-in ads which we can click to respawn the character? Also, it'd be better if instead of two movement buttons placed on only one side of the screen, why not make either sides of the screen be for forward move through right screen and backward move through left, and double click for removing the hindrances? Just my two cents, but overall it's a nice game to kill time
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game
Add restart button inside the lvls plz! It will disappear if z time runs out. Thnks

description: Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis. I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. descriptionHTML:
Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!

Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis.
I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. Ta hjälp av massor av karaktärer som Babblarna, Svea och Pino för att engagera era förskolebarn!

Hur fungerar Jaramba Förskola?

• Jaramba Förskola ger obegränsad tillgång till innehåll som motsvarar hundratals fristående appar
• Nya spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt läggs till varje månad i en aldrig sinande ström av nytt material
• Det speciellt framtagna gränssnittet riktar sig till dig som pedagog för att du enkelt ska kunna förbereda, eller spontant starta, en lärorik stund med barnen
• Använd ett abonnemang för en avdelning på upp till 20 barn
• Styr vad barnen fokuserar på med Jaramba Förskolas fokuslås
• Jaramba Förskola streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en Android-enhet, så appen upptar aldrig onödigt utrymme.

Då Jaramba förskola är avsedd för bruk i förskoleverksamhet kommer vi till en början att administrera användarkonton genom intresseanmälan på https://jaramba.se/forskola
Kontakta Jaramba online för att komma igång med konto för din förskola idag!

Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/
Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/
recentChanges: - Stöd för länkar direkt till mediabrickor och spellistor
summary: An app specially developed for Swedish preschools. All the exercises in the same place!
title: Jaramba Förskola – Digitalt hjälpmedel i förskolan

description: It’s JAWS...but with crocodiles!*CHOMP CHOMP CHOMP*	This ravenous crocodile lurks after its frantic prey. With an appetite as big as this beast, you can hunt and snatch up anything. Swim, slither, crawl, and attack! Emerge suddenly from the waters, crawl onto the shore of the beach, and explore around the island looking for your next meal, frightening the unexpecting humans and animals equally. Get them unawares! Control this giant in water and on land. Additionally, change the skin of your crocodile to cool themes including  your country’s flag (if you’re feeling patriotic)!Put your massive jaws to use and cause chaos! Your hunger must be quenched!Crocodile Attack 2016 Features:•Beautifully crafted 3D graphics & realistic water environments: including beaches, docks & open sea•Huge hungry animated 3D crocodile•Smooth and easy controls to make the crocodile swim and attack•Fast action packed gameplay•Girls, Cows, Goats, Chickens and more•Plenty of fun sounds and visual effects**INSTALL NOW AND START CHOMPING!!**About TapinatorTapinator (Ticker: TAPM) develops and publishes games on mobile platforms. The Company’s portfolio includes over 300 mobile gaming titles that, collectively, have achieved over 450 million player downloads. Tapinator is headquartered in New York. For more info, visit Tapinator.com.

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you’re ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

comments: Cute game but doesn't work My kids wanted to play this game, but it has only worked once out of approx 20 times we've tried to open it. Its a shame because it seems like a cute game.
My son is able to play for about 2 minutes before it ends and asks us to pay. He finds is super frustrating.
Pop up adds are constantly  popping up. My grandson if frustrated beyond  believe. It drives him crazy. It actually  interferes with playing the game

This game is super cute and my son loves it but the problem is, it says its free but you can only choose from 3 cars, 3 arms for digging and 3 different buckets/jackhammer and 1 level unless you pay for the "full version" which is unlocking the cars, then you gotta pay to unlock the arms, then the buckets/hammer and then the level. So when all is said and done you will have spent around $22 for a crappy game that has pop-ups and advertising. So ya not to effin happy right now. Don't say a game is free when you have to pay to play anything and everything.
Very bad and i give every a goos thing thanks a lot i broke my record
Terrible UI design When kids push the wrong button on the level select screen they are punished by being taken back to the title screen.

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

I have been playing for a while now, I like almost all of the game, not too impressed that "the piggy bank " is basically held to ransom until you buy it... find another way to entice spending... reduce number of coins won or something but as the levels get hard if you dont spend money you get stuck even with team helps.. it gets disheartening and reduces interest after a while.. to the gamemakers: keep the game playable..the money will come

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

Update...as I go though the levels Ill get stuck for a day or two...even 3 on a level. Gameplay FUN has Dropped significantly. Moved to 3 stars as a result. If it does not change I'll continue to move to 1 star. Games are many to be played...not just stuck on a level forever!  Other issue with the game is that there's so much clicking and waiting once you win. I wish that it would just go right to the next level and it wouldn't have to wait for the splash screen. I just spend so much time wasted versus playing

It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.

Don't waste your time playing this game.  I got too 300 + levels but you get 100 coins for completing each level.  Unfortunately it goes in a piggy bank, which you need to pay to break starting from £1.99, then next piggy bank was £4.99.  It's a con!

descriptionHTML:

description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Different sections of roads.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- No annoying ads.- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store in order to improve (suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ...)

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!

description: Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone? Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house?  Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!  Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party! Features:> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies! > Throw a secret party with your puppy - choose your favorite party music & show off your dance moves! Shhh... it’s a secret! > Sing and chat with your pet puppy - she’ll repeat what you say!> Dress up your puppy in the most adorable outfits & doggy accessories. > Feed your puppy yummy snacks like steak, ice cream, & drumsticks! > Care for your pet puppy when she’s sick. Take her to the doctor’s clinic!> Bathe your puppy - give your pet a warm bubble bath!  > Win tons of awesome toys & furniture to decorate your puppy’s room! descriptionHTML:
Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone?
Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house? Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!

Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party!

Features:
> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies!

> Win tons of awesome toys & furniture to decorate your puppy’s room!

comments: Great at first but after a little time it gets a little boring. But it's still fun! And the bunny is so cute when we play in the park! Also there's nothing to do more than healing animals, taking their photo and playing in the park.

Ads pop up in the middle of you moving things to the animal. At least wait for then level or action to be completed. I know that the beginning of most games are free and that is appreciated, but at least let the player finish an action.

The controls didnt even work.... I couldnt help the poor animal 😢 It was devastating... I love all Coco games but this one is horrible...! Please fix the controls.. Also the animals are really ugly!? Why??!!

I like it a lot, but I kind of wish there were more animals, such as hamsters or reptiles or horses, something like that. Also I wish playing with the animals wasn't so cheesy. The cat's dance is so stupid. Why isn't there just yarn or something? Overall it's a pretty fun game, with just those issues

descriptionHTML:
How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!

Fun features:
- Easy concepts with child-friendly gameplay
- 4 independent scenes with fun interactions
- Silly and entertaining animations!

With freedom comes responsibility. Our goal is to bring safety awarenesses to children. They will relate safety tips to the situations they see and catch all the poor behaviors acted out by our silly panda Kiki. Maybe they will pay more attention to safety the next time they go out, too!

-- -- --

Design concepts:
We focus on inspirational learning
We focus on skill-building
We focus on bringing fun contents to our young audience
Take the baby bus for an unique learning experience!

The series introduction:
BabyBus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6.

The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers.

Tips: In the search bar, enter "BabyBus" to find all of our products.

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:
Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.
The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.

In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.


Good luck and have a fun!

description: The perfect union of car puzzles and logic game. If you are looking for a logic game that makes you think and race car themed, this is the puzzle game you were looking for. The mission of this car game is to build the racing circuit without leaving a free space.Game of puzzles of cars of competition, that you must join the exit with the goal. Think and use logic to complete each challenge. It will help you train your intelligence. Each puzzle is a logical maze.Characteristics:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Increased difficulty of puzzles.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- Car puzzle game that you must build car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that a game of cars is a video game in which the objective is to travel a certain distance or go from one place to another in the shortest possible time, as in motor racing and motorcycling. On the other hand the logic games are pastimes or games that consist in finding the solution of a problem raised. And to end wit is the mental ability to solve problems.Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store to improve. (Suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ....)
descriptionHTML:
The perfect union of car puzzles and logic game. If you are looking for a logic game that makes you think and race car themed, this is the puzzle game you were looking for. The mission of this car game is to build the racing circuit without leaving a free space.

Game of puzzles of cars of competition, that you must join the exit with the goal. Think and use logic to complete each challenge. It will help you train your intelligence. Each puzzle is a logical maze.

Characteristics:
- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.
- Simple logic.
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Increased difficulty of puzzles.
- Does not contain purchases within the application.
- Hours of fun.
- Car puzzle game that you must build car circuits.
- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.
- Video game totally free.
- You do not need the Internet.
- It takes up little space.
- You can train the mind.

Remember that a game of cars is a video game in which the objective is to travel a certain distance or go from one place to another in the shortest possible time, as in motor racing and motorcycling. On the other hand the logic games are pastimes or games that consist in finding the solution of a problem raised. And to end wit is the mental ability to solve problems.

Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store to improve. (Suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ....)

description: The world of Freecraft is waiting for you in the new game FreeCraft My Buildings. Now this world is even more diverse. Behind every corner of this cubic world a new story awaits you. You can watch the wildlife in Creativity mode or participate in her life in Survival mode. But do not think that it's so easy to survive in the world of Freecraft, because it's only in the daytime that ordinary predators can attack you, from which you can hide in a tree or in a hastily built hovel. And at night absolutely other monsters who are hungry to taste your flesh awake!Do not forget about Multiplayer, in which you can survive with your friends, they will always support you in a difficult situation! Build a house, grow vegetables or arrange a PvP battle!Features:- New graphics in pixel style- New unique mobs- Several additional biomes that you can find in Freecraft spaces- 3 modes: Survival, Creative and Survival in Multiplayer- Crafting system, both on a computer- Multiplayer and a huge number of servers- Beautiful Texture Pack- Unique gameplayDownload Free Craft My Buildings for free, create a world in which you want to live!This FreeCraft Open Source Project is an open source software distributed under the LGPLv3 license. You can find the license and the source code on the website. descriptionHTML:
The world of Freecraft is waiting for you in the new game FreeCraft My Buildings. Now this world is even more diverse. Behind every corner of this cubic world a new story awaits you. You can watch the wildlife in Creativity mode or participate in her life in Survival mode. But do not think that it's so easy to survive in the world of Freecraft, because it's only in the daytime that ordinary predators can attack you, from which you can hide in a tree or in a hastily built hovel. And at night absolutely other monsters who are hungry to taste your flesh awake!

Do not forget about Multiplayer, in which you can survive with your friends, they will always support you in a difficult situation!
 
Build a house, grow vegetables or arrange a PvP battle!

Features:
- New graphics in pixel style
- New unique mobs
- Several additional biomes that you can find in Freecraft spaces
- 3 modes: Survival, Creative and Survival in Multiplayer
- Crafting system, both on a computer
- Multiplayer and a huge number of servers
- Beautiful Texture Pack
- Unique gameplay

Download Free Craft My Buildings for free, create a world in which you want to live!
