description: Looking for Amazing Spider Super Hero Time? Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is the game for you. A US Army Super Spider Hero becomes an Amazing Spider Super Hero Time in this superhero game. Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is going to fulfill all you superhero needs.Background story of this superhero game:A US Army superhero has been moved from bounty hunting situation in a city where monster shooting for monster killing was required. The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.What is this SuperHero Game all about:This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience in this great game.3. Entertaining music: This hunting game has a very entertaining music!.4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this monster game are very realistic and they keep you fully engaged in this killer game.5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this spider game as the aim is to save the jungle from the monsters.6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killer game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully involved. Each mission in this spider game is time bound with a specific elimination target of monsters to keep you focused on the job at hand.7. Player Feedback: Kool Games is always looking forward to your feedback on this US hunter game and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting.Who should play this monster game?Anybody who wants a challenge to keep himself safe from the monsters should play this game and establish the basic skills in the simulating environment mapping to the real world. Everyone else looking for endless hunt of monsters is also welcome to play this killer game.When to play this US hunter game?This game can be played at any time during the day or during the night. You are at office or at home, wherever you are free for monster hunting, just pull out your mobile and enjoy playing this killer game.Kindly do not forget to provide the rating for this hunt game as per your hunting game experience and you can also suggest improvements in your feedback/ review comments of this game.Enjoy the FOREST HUNTER game.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for Amazing Spider Super Hero Time? Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is the game for you. A US Army Super Spider Hero becomes an Amazing Spider Super Hero Time in this superhero game. Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is going to fulfill all you superhero needs.

Background story of this superhero game:

A US Army superhero has been moved from bounty hunting situation in a city where monster shooting for monster killing was required. The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.

What is this SuperHero Game all about:

This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.

How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?

You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:

1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.

2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.

3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.

4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.

5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.

Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?

You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:

1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!

2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience in this great game.

3. Entertaining music: This hunting game has a very entertaining music!.

4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this monster game are very realistic and they keep you fully engaged in this killer game.

5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this spider game as the aim is to save the jungle from the monsters.

6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killer game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully involved. Each mission in this spider game is time bound with a specific elimination target of monsters to keep you focused on the job at hand.

7. Player Feedback: Kool Games is always looking forward to your feedback on this US hunter game and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting.

Who should play this monster game?

Anybody who wants a challenge to keep himself safe from the monsters should play this game and establish the basic skills in the simulating environment mapping to the real world. Everyone else looking for endless hunt of monsters is also welcome to play this killer game.

When to play this US hunter game?

This game can be played at any time during the day or during the night. You are at office or at home, wherever you are free for monster hunting, just pull out your mobile and enjoy playing this killer game.

Kindly do not forget to provide the rating for this hunt game as per your hunting game experience and you can also suggest improvements in your feedback/ review comments of this game.

Enjoy the FOREST HUNTER game.
summary: Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time is the best Super Spider Hero
title: Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time

comments: Someone needs to be fired or at least schooled on currency exchange rates. They offer 2 packs for 5 and 20 then except for rare sales which offer 49 and 79 dollar packs everything is 100 dollars google should step in and pull this game off the google play market for a square enix licensed product they have enough backing to have actual microtransactions not be a game exclusive to rich people who use 100 dollar bills as toilet paper...

When it's not crashing, it's fun to play.  Sucks when it doesn't load of locks up during game play.  Also it gets expensive as you have to buy packs at $99 a pop after the 1st 2.  The game play is addicting, but no fun if you cannot afford the special offers they continue to throw in your face every time you log in.  I love final fantasy games but this particular one is a money pit!.  Not to mention the constant crashing

Please understand that there is really nothing free about this game except the install. While the gameplay WAS very promising at first, purchaseable bonus packs take any strategy completely out of the game. Now, in addition, each new element of the game that has been released in recent weeks requires cash to unlock. I can only use about half of the games features now. Bummer. If you're willing to pay, have a blast with this game. Otherwise leave it alone!

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.

comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. And add newer cars and guns it's fun but and the same time it's boring plz do these.!!!!!!!!!!!

Pretty good game, though there should be a higher emphasis on fighting. We should be able to register accounts, and receive money for our kills. Also, when we kill someone, it should say in chat who we killed. Game has great potential, registering accounts would be nice to so that we can make friends and remember people. :D

I love the game, it is a great time killer, but I have suggestions. First you should add more guns, like pistols, and add grenades. Also have the plane controls more easier to use, I always have difficulty with that. Add more maps, more planes to fly. Make it so it can save the cars or planes you get. I always lose money buying the same car again every time I log back in the game. Other than that, I love the game!

Make a option where you can choose your sensitivity. The sniper Scope is harder to you in with the new one. Make more guns in the game. Finally when you stay still in the game: people, cars, move which makes it harder to shoot. One you run over a player they should die. Please add these stuff to the game for a 5 star rating.

description: In World Crafting Empire you'll explore a beautiful world and mine thousands of blocks with one swipe of your finger. Befriend mobs and animals to mine by your side and craft awesome gear like potions, enchanted books, furnaces and pickaxes to enhance your journey. This is the world's best incremental idle mining and crafting game!7 REASONS TO BUILD YOUR OWN WORLD CRAFTING EMPIRE!~~~~~~~~~~* SWIPE TO MINE - Tap n’ swipe to mine thousands of blocks and resources instantly.* BEFRIEND MOBS – Save animals and mobs trapped in jelly to mine for you while you’re away!* CRAFT AWESOME GEAR - Use your resources to craft everything from Nether Bricks to Eyes of Ender.* EXPLORE A WORLD - Explore and discover beautiful scenic biomes as your adventure develops.* FRENZIED MINING – Tornados, TNT, and a giant golden hammer harvest entire chunks in an instant!* INVEST WISELY - Prove your RPG strategy with smart decisions on which gear and mobs to befriend, craft and upgrade.* PLAY ANYWHERE! - The world’s best idle mining and crafting game is free to play online or offline!Support: https://futureplaygames.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/categories/360000030191-Craft-Away-Privacy Policy: http://www.futureplaygames.com/privacypolicy.htmlTerms of Service: http://www.futureplaygames.com/termsofservice.html

description: By installing this game, you will get high-quality 3d graphics and realistic animations of professional soccer.Choose your favorite team from the list of real teams-applicants and participants of the 2018 World Cup in Russia, go through the whole tournament, from the group stage, playoff matches and win in the final - make your team Soccer World Champion in 2018.The game has several gameplay modes:- Penalties- Dribbling- CombinedGame Modes:- Single Player- MultiplayerPlayer Customizer: in FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018 - you can create your own character.Install and play - it has never been so easy to be on a huge stadium and score a goal that will decide the fate of your national team.Enjoy the believability of the football simulator, great 3D animations, simple and intuitive controls, exciting game mechanics, created with the help of professional soccer players.Start playing and getting comfortable is very simple, but you have to try to win. Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.
Ads pop up during gameplay where your fingers contact so it stops game play ... other than that it's good but I've had enough. Fk you chilly:-p uninstalling

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

descriptionHTML:
Adopt the cute rabbits bunny and help her to grow up, taking care of her, dress her up, decorate her house and make her the cutest of rabbits !
Discover the city of bunnies with multiple activities and games to keep your pet busy. In rabbit city, you never get bored !

🐰 ADOPT BABY BU
This pet needs a new family. You have been chosen to take care of this rabbit and take care of it !

🐰 TAKE CARE OF HER
Take care of Bu and become her best friend, help her to evolve from baby to adult to become the rabbit city star!

🐰 GIVE HER A STYLE
A gigantic wardrobe awaits you to allow you to make your rabbit unique. From the princess outfit to the the rock star, your bunny will be the cutest !

🐰 A UNIQUE WORLD
Make your rabbits pet's house a magical and unique place. Customize the rooms according to your tastes !

🐰 GAMES AND ACTIVITIES
Bu is part of a cute and imaginary world, she lives in the city of bunnies, a city populated with extraordinary rabbits.
But many other animals are hidden there and they have with them magic items, it's up to you to find them to unlock unique clothes !
You will also find many other activities and games in the city of rabbits: The sticker store to start a unique collection of beautiful pictures, the photo booth to show the world that you have the most cute rabbits, a beauty salon to change the appearance of your bunny so that it is unique.
But also challenges, missions, trips and mini games to take care of your bunny and have fun so she never gets bored !

Now that this game and the universe of bunnies has no secrets for you, come and discover and take care of this cute rabbits baby bunny !
Your turn !

This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

descriptionHTML:
If you are looking for REAL mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.

AMAZING ACTION!
Prove yourself fast in daytime and nighttime tracks, dare to speed in hostile conditions and terrain, drift along the turns and pay attention to your co-driver's pacenotes (Or he will get mad, we can assure it!).

DRIVE ON REAL-WORLD TRACKS!
Drive on awesome tracks: they are all modeled around existing and famous rally tracks, feel every little road's roughness, run on the edge of a pitfall, feel the breeze of the Alps' snow and the heat of the Mexico sun!

AMAZING CARS!
Customize the driver's name and the name of your co-pilot together with their country flags and stick them on your car's window! Get your livery dirty while trying to nail that turn, chose among a lot of different cars, each with its handling and performance!

Chose among two different championships: J-SPEC for beginners and S-SPEC for legendary drivers! Will you get to top??

description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ☆ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

comments: It's okay and the graphics are really nice, the sound effects are good but ultimately, you play and play and play and play and still not got to the other towns. I've got to about the 7th and had enough of trying to get further and not progressing much. It's okay for a few days but after that, and like someone else has mentioned about the ads, too many to get little rewards

Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. 👌👍❤

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

So much potential! It's a cute game with enormous room to grow. I loved it but after I completed all the quests and max out all the levels for my family I have some ideas on how to make this game better. First, the movement controls were infuriatingly difficult and not intuitive for first time gamers (such as myself). Maybe instructions and a different set up would work. Also, please reward us better after completing all the quests, I want to feel like all the grinding was worth it. It was fun, thank you!

Love it but have some suggestions!!! First of all I think we should start out as cubs, then grow up and find a new territory. You would be able to choose how much territory you want, have a multiplayer mode and be able to breed. Have the cubs born and then grow, and have to feed them. Make the cubs eat too, and be able to take the carcass to the den. Have the seasons change, and have the character lay down anywhere. Put a clean yourself button on. Have certain areas where one animal is abundant, and only one watering hole.

descriptionHTML:
Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. Be a Wild Cheetah and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of cheetahs, fight against fierce animals like lion, crocodile and rhino. FEATURES:

REALISTIC SIMULATOR
Maintain your health and energy by eating and drinking water, raise your family, explore massive world, fight other animals to become more powerful

START YOUR FAMILY
Wild Cheetah Sim features the ability to have real family. Family members are not only good companions but they can be trained to fight along side in combat

REAL DAY AND NIGHT
Wild Cheetah Sim has a real in-game cycle of day and night on a 24 hour based time system. For every 24 minutes that the game is played, a full day and night cycle of 24 hours passes in the game

ACHIEVEMENTS
The game features achievement system. Unlock the achievements by hunting specific animals and discover amazing facts about Cheetah.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
- RPG-style gameplay: level up, evolve, complete quests
- Different options of appearance for cheetah
- Information tab in game menu to view characteristics of animals
- Rotatable camera, zoom in and out
- Realistic environments, big world
- A lot of real animals to hunt
- Quest system, 20 missions to complete
- Awesome 3D graphics

comments: Awesome game. Very nice controls but greedy devs. I spend money in games but to pay 59 sek just to remove ads is too much. And too many ads which spoils the otherwise great game. Either reduce the cost to remove ads or include other benefits to the same cost. The frequency of ads should be reduced.

Fun gameplay, but a bit buggy and confusing when a train is near a switch since you often stop a train when trying to switch it. Difficulty ramps up to insanely unfair after the first few levels. Since the passengers spawn at random even when you're absolutely perfect at switching the trains you still don't often get 3 stars on the level. Getting 3 stars on a level is basically luck at that point.

This game was great for the first few levels, and then some frustrations set in about the design. Some levels are just tough to see which tracks go where because of the nature of the isometric view, but the real deal breaker for me is having to click the arrow to switch a track path. Why can't this be a lever to the side of the track, especially when two path switches overlap? Countless times I've accidentally stopped a train on an intersection instead of switching the track for the next train. It tests your patience instead of your multitasking and tracking abilities. The ads are very, very plentiful. I urge you to continue using the free version if you want to support the devs because they probably get more revenue from ads in the long run than the $5 cost to remove the ads. Potentially great.

Rigged gameplay. I made it thru several levels until I tapped on the train and it didnt stop, resulting in a crash, further resulting in a 30 second ad that I couldn't escape. How convenient. I have noticed more and more developers finding ever-newer ways to slip ads into the games.

This game was honestly amazing. I love how it's such a simple game yet it's so much fun to play. The low poly graphics and the music really synchronized and make it so much more better. Even the tutorial, it integrates into the game in a very interesting manner. The only problem was that it lags a bit, but otherwise Northplay, loved it!
Hadn't played it for a while, went back and it had deleted all my progress. Not going to start again, so deleting the app
description: Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.  Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.  As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.  • Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds • Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches • Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions • Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection • Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit • Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ • Share your most explosive crashes with your friends • Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle
descriptionHTML:
Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.

Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.

As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.

• Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds
• Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches
• Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions
• Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection
• Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit
• Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ
• Share your most explosive crashes with your friends
• Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

description: The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car. descriptionHTML:
The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!
New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!

As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.
Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car.
Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.
Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.
Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.
Hurry up and join the impossible race now!

description: Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.The Underbelly of the Justice System...Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you. Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation. Time is of the Essence... It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down. Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life. Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight your way against dozens of foes and take control over the justice system as you battle your way to freedom. The fight starts now. Characteristics: Hidden melee & firearm weapons. Collect health and ammo pickups as you explore your surroundings. Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress. Interactive map. Choose from a variety of weapons. Expansive levels to explore.

This map is a simulator of the most real prison where you have the right to choose how you want to play, for which team, etc. But on this game- this is not the only attraction, there is also a dining room, a forest, a lake and a village. Uncover the keyhole of the prison walls and adventures in it with Prison!
In this role-playing multiplayer game there are many police cars: black with flashing lights, everything is as it should be. Hard-to-manage horses are also at your disposal. Imagine that you are a real cop. Or maybe on this multiplayer role-playing map MCPE you prefer to be a criminal and make an escape. Since the game is role-playing and multiplayer, invite friends, divide into teams and choose who will be the cop, and who will make an escape in the sandbox of Minecraft. Become a participant in criminal adventures.
Multiplayer role-playing Minecraft map - 3in1: crime, escape, adventure!

THE INSTRUCTION HOW TO INSTALL MAPS FOR MCPE
1) Download free of charge application
2) Open an installer
3) Install maps
4) Select maps from settings of resources of Minecraft Pocket Edition
summary: Do you want to play cops and criminals or go to MCPE prison?
title: Prison crime getaway– MCPE map

description: The Decorate Your Walk In Closet game is a great room decoration game which is capable of releasing your inner interior designer. This game is great fun for everyone to enjoy and allows you to make up your own closet just the way you want it to be.You can decorate this decoration game with wall paper, lighting, ceiling color, flooring, lounge suites, rug, wall decorations, handbag shelving, floor decorations, clothes shelving, jewellery shelving and shoe shelving. This game works by simply clicking on each separate icon multiple times to change the decoration or color of each section the icons represent. You will see each item magically appear and change in front of your eyes. If you want to go back to the basics and restart over all you have to do is press the “reset” button at the bottom left hand side of the screen and your room will go back to the way it was when you first started. This shoes closet decoration game is great fun and can give you plenty of ideas for your own closet design in your own home. With so many decoration games fun you can have, you really can’t go wrong with the inspiring and great Decorate Your Walk In Closet game today!

Drag the ball to the left or right to avoid all obstacles and
try not to fall off the track! Collect many power-ups to transform the ball

• Nice music and 3d sound effects

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out
summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

description: Have you ever wanted to own and look after your own horse? Well now you can with the horse grooming salon game! Here you will be able to easily choose your own horse and do all the things that need to be done when owning and looking after your horse. Here you can clean out her stall, swat all the annoying flies, as well as wash, dry and brush her to make her look pretty. You can also change her horse shoes and remove any dirt, while also feeding her, watering her, rubbing her down and giving her vaccinations. Once done you can easily accessorize by using a bridle, saddle, and headpiece to prepare her for her day out riding with this fun horse grooming game. Game Features: - CHOOSE your very own horse to look after- CLEAN up all the poo with the broom- SWAT all the flies before they bite your horse and cause sores- WASH, rinse, dry and brush your horse ready for her grooming session- CLEAN her teeth to give her a beautiful smile. - CHANGE her horse shoes so she can ride without pain or discomfort- CLIP her hair to make it look nice and straight for her big debut- VACCINATE your horse so she can be around other horses- FEED and water your horse so she is ready for riding- RUB all her good spots to show her you love her- ACCESSORIZE with a saddle, head piece and bridle** version 3.0.0 LATEST UPDATE- play levels you want with our contextual level menu, button is located on the top right corner- earn coins to unlock new horses- added new horses- faster game play
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever wanted to own and look after your own horse? Well now you can with the horse grooming salon game! Here you will be able to easily choose your own horse and do all the things that need to be done when owning and looking after your horse. Here you can clean out her stall, swat all the annoying flies, as well as wash, dry and brush her to make her look pretty. You can also change her horse shoes and remove any dirt, while also feeding her, watering her, rubbing her down and giving her vaccinations. Once done you can easily accessorize by using a bridle, saddle, and headpiece to prepare her for her day out riding with this fun horse grooming game.

Game Features:

- CHOOSE your very own horse to look after

- CLEAN up all the poo with the broom

- SWAT all the flies before they bite your horse and cause sores

- WASH, rinse, dry and brush your horse ready for her grooming session

- CLEAN her teeth to give her a beautiful smile.

- CHANGE her horse shoes so she can ride without pain or discomfort

- CLIP her hair to make it look nice and straight for her big debut

- VACCINATE your horse so she can be around other horses

- FEED and water your horse so she is ready for riding

- RUB all her good spots to show her you love her

- ACCESSORIZE with a saddle, head piece and bridle

** version 3.0.0 LATEST UPDATE

- play levels you want with our contextual level menu, button is located on the top right corner

- earn coins to unlock new horses

- added new horses

- faster game play
summary: Owning your own horse doesn't have to be a dream, choose yours today.
title: Horse Grooming Salon

comments: Pre-registered for this game and it didn't disappoint. Graphics are smooth, characters are great with fluid combat system. My only bad point with it is that after a few days of playing I went to open up the game and it won't load, I get as far as the n way screen then black screen?? Please fix Devs, anxious to delve back into it.

OMG ITS FINALLY OUT! I've been waiting for this to come out for like literally 4 years! Anyway so far I honestly liked the equipment system in the original version better than this one.. I don't like the whole idea of unlocking equipment you got, that just doesn't even make a lot of sense.. Plus there is an equipment list that kinda shows you what everything looks like right now so thats a bit of a spoiler for me for obtaining new gear.. Other than that, the gameplay is great! You get all 4 characters much more immediately and I do like that. 4 stars at this point but I can see myself coming back and bumping it up to 5!

So far so good.. pretty smooth but i guess the graphic got downgraded because i remember this game had better graphic quaLity before.. maybe add graphic quaLity option? aLso the targeting system is a bit too hard.. maybe add an option to assist targeting because it's hard to aim i kept getting missed hits.. overaLL its decent.. keep it up!

The game runs decent although you do need wifi or a very good connection for arena. Everything is very limited due to the awful energy/stamina system which will obviously be a huge downfall. It gets repetitive fairly quick and is limited on what you can actually do. Looks like it will be heavily P2W with all the store sales and again, running out of energy quickly. It's a good game for an hour here or there but for a game that you need to farm items for equipment the energy limit really ruins it. I'll be looking elsewhere for a similar game without the energy/stamina limitations

Fun game, but it pisses me off that games with this potential are ran by greedy companies. This game is littered with P2W aspects and locked behind energy and time walls. It's like corrupting something awesome and makes me sick, I won't be giving this much attention because of it.

description: Is it a Robot? Is it a Snake? It’s a Robo-Snake!Uh-oh...there’s been a mishap at the lab. A science experiment has gone horribly wrong after researchers attempted to create a docile Robo-Snake! The monster escaped and is on the loose in your town! Fend off superheroes and cops as they chase you around the city! Terrorize the streets full of roaming pedestrians. People will fight you with any weapons they can get their hands on… Show them you’re the strongest predator with your special android and reptilian powers. Battle and attack! Use special attacks that allow you to spit fire and coil your tail around your prey. Reel the victims in with your strong tail!Transform between an anaconda and a robot! You have the best of both worlds. Slither and slide through the city. Destroy buildings, throw vehicles, and kill opponents to get maximum points during missions. Can you escape the city and avoid animal control and police? Transform Snake Robot City Battle 2017 Features:• Awesome 3D city environment to explore• Realistic visual & sound effects• Intuitive & Addictive gameplay• Transformation features to transform your snake to super robot• Realistic Snake and Robot Anatomy and Physics• Challenging Missions to complete in modern city environment.

description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog’s race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs. Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily. Features:Attractive and adventurous game playAmazing multiple races dogsMultiple exciting levels Realistic background sound effectsSmooth and easy controlThrilling and multiple challenges Amazing stunning 3d graphicsRealistic running tracks

description: Game Skull Studio would welcome you to our Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster with incredible shadow hero and his combat fire throwing powers! You are scientist in an army secret laboratory. All truth about super mutant experiments are hidden. It will not be so easy to solve this mystery, maybe there will be some criminal elements too. So, solve this case by analysing all clues. Maybe you will find something new about yourself too as a torch king hero.Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster Game Play:The game play of this Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster Mafia is different as other san andreas mafia mission games. Your player is flying Lightning Shadow hero and you’ve to fight against the gangsters, deadly criminals, mad city mafia and other immortal enemy shooters. You would have to save the innocent citizens of the whole futuristic city. Oh Should I tell you this amazing news, as an amazing Shadow mafia hero you can use different powers to beat your enemies, like lightning, throwing fire at them and many more.Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster Features:* Variety of rescue Lightning Shadow Hero with high fly.* Challenging City Rescue with flying superhero.* Real time City Simulator against the deadly criminals.* 10 action packed levels against gangsters.* Devastating flying experience of amazing Lightning Shadow mafia hero.* Survival City Environment to Explore against mad city mafia.Have you ever played any king of gangster & lightning shadow hero game of 2017? You’ll get an amazing experience after playing this gangster hero squad game! US army is busy on army camp to fight with criminals and thieves so only super lightning hero as a true master. Find an angry boss of worse evils to get all the information about their weak points and start a battle against injustice of crime city.You can use your lightning power, throwing fire and other mafia powers to shoot on the war criminals! What should be your role if your city had been assaulted by city crime plan, deadly criminals activities? City crime is expanding by Criminal Mafia Heist and your city is in need of some rock hero and epic heroes same as lightning shadow hero. Take part in this anti-crime battle against extreme terror and use your marvellous strategy and unlimited power of incredible superheroes to protect your city and people around you from these Immortal Beasts & kings of gangster hero mafia.This is the new action adventurous simulator pack exciting game. Lightning hero fights crime against the law. Your super light hero solves the people problems in the city. With super powers, you have to do impossible tasks. Incredible Superhero has eye laser power to fight with war criminals in city. Arrest deadly criminals involved in street crime.In this Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster game of 2018, you have the opportunity to become super lightning hero and shadow hero of futuristic city and you would have full control on incredible mutant shadow hero and you have to kill the gangster hero and war mafias!This is going to be the greatest battles in a war history. War against assassins, champions, mafias is nothing compare with this contest. Have you ever dreamed of being a battle hero, an action hero or a super light hero? Futuristic battle is knocking at your door with king hero, you should prepare yourself for future fight.Get ready for a city war and be a super shadow hero! Game Skull Studio would welcome you to our Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster with incredible shadow hero and his combat fire throwing powers! You are scientist in an army secret laboratory. All truth about super mutant experiments are hidden. It will not be so easy to solve this mystery, maybe there will be some criminal elements too. So, solve this case by analysing all clues. Maybe you will find something new about yourself too as a torch king hero.

Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster Game Play:

The game play of this Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster Mafia is different as other san andreas mafia mission games. Your player is flying Lightning Shadow hero and you’ve to fight against the gangsters, deadly criminals, mad city mafia and other immortal enemy shooters. You would have to save the innocent citizens of the whole futuristic city. Oh Should I tell you this amazing news, as an amazing Shadow mafia hero you can use different powers to beat your enemies, like lightning, throwing fire at them and many more.

* Devastating flying experience of amazing Lightning Shadow mafia hero.

In this Lightning Shadow Hero: King of Gangster game of 2018, you have the opportunity to become super lightning hero and shadow hero of futuristic city and you would have full control on incredible mutant shadow hero and you have to kill the gangster hero and war mafias!

This is going to be the greatest battles in a war history. War against assassins, champions, mafias is nothing compare with this contest. Pretty good game, Has some issues   I loved the game, no doubt about it. But, there could be some improvements. The names should be changed like, for Kylo Ren, Call him TANTRUM. It's totally awesome I love this game. Great time killer. Really addictive. You can get new characters and your skills improve alot after awhile. Although it says it has stopped after every time that you exit/turn off your phone or tablet, it's a great game.

Pretty much a crossya a roads clone, but suprisingly more structured. Controls take some getting used too, and there are some cheap deaths when it comes to the river crossings. Visiting different Star Wars planets with different Star Wars characters in our favorite crossy roads fashion makes this a great game for any Star Wars fan.

description: ▪ Fight with friends for highest online score!▪ Randomly created levels (never play the same thing twice!)▪ Challenging scenarios!▪ Destructible environment!▪ Awesome roster of heroes with unique abilities!▪ Many clever enemies!▪ Seriously Fun obstacles!▪ Unlock lots of funny characters!▪ Share videos or photos of your best moments!Star in the galaxy's most epic endless road crossing game!Super challenging, but fun for any age!*** Galactic Road Crossing ***This game packs tons of the things you've come to love about road crossing games but ups the ante x 2! Galaxy Hoppers improves upon our other crossy games with multi-planet exploration and fully destructible environments! We guarantee that this is the most epic, most fun, most challenging crossy game in the galaxy! Sure there are cars, road, rivers and logs, but now throw in aliens, robot wars, ice monsters, fire traps, space ships and a fully destructible environment!*** Hop Across the Stars ***Blast across the galaxy from one star to the next. You'll find yourself voyaging across multiple planets each with it's own challenges! Run through the fire traps of the lava planet! Slice through the forrest jungle avoiding racing speeders and mech warrior bots! Hop through the sand alien wars quickly avoiding the stampeding Sand Mammoths and giant worm pits! Hop for your life across the frozen world before the ice monster awakens! Freely-hopping enemies will close in on your location and force you to react quickly. Can you survive and claim the top score or will the Galactic Wars take you?*** Compete with Friends ***Compete with your friends online for the highest score and prove that you are the greatest survivor in your solar system. Check your score regularly and improve your game. Show your friends who the real star is. Climb to the top of the online Google Play leaderboard while you force their scores downwards! As you level up and improve your roster of characters you'll become unstoppable!*** Funny Characters ***There are tons of funny characters to unlock! Each one has their own unique ability. Deflect lasers as the sabre wielding space ninja or blast away alien after alien with smuggler's blaster sidearm. Each time you play your character will gain Experience Points moving you from level 1 to 2 to 3 and so on. Levelling up will unlock new characters with new abilities. Unlock all characters to complete your own unstoppable galactic force!This is a super fun, lovingly crafted game. And best of all it's totally free!Welcome to the world's crossy-est space wars shooter game!
descriptionHTML:
▪ Fight with friends for highest online score!
▪ Randomly created levels (never play the same thing twice!)
▪ Challenging scenarios!
▪ Destructible environment!
▪ Awesome roster of heroes with unique abilities!
▪ Many clever enemies!
▪ Seriously Fun obstacles!
▪ Unlock lots of funny characters!
▪ Share videos or photos of your best moments!

Star in the galaxy's most epic endless road crossing game!
Super challenging, but fun for any age!

*** Galactic Road Crossing ***
This game packs tons of the things you've come to love about road crossing games but ups the ante x 2! Galaxy Hoppers improves upon our other crossy games with multi-planet exploration and fully destructible environments! We guarantee that this is the most epic, most fun, most challenging crossy game in the galaxy! Sure there are cars, road, rivers and logs, but now throw in aliens, robot wars, ice monsters, fire traps, space ships and a fully destructible environment!

*** Hop Across the Stars ***
Blast across the galaxy from one star to the next. You'll find yourself voyaging across multiple planets each with it's own challenges! Run through the fire traps of the lava planet! Slice through the forrest jungle avoiding racing speeders and mech warrior bots! Hop through the sand alien wars quickly avoiding the stampeding Sand Mammoths and giant worm pits! Hop for your life across the frozen world before the ice monster awakens! Freely-hopping enemies will close in on your location and force you to react quickly. Can you survive and claim the top score or will the Galactic Wars take you?

*** Compete with Friends ***
Compete with your friends online for the highest score and prove that you are the greatest survivor in your solar system. Check your score regularly and improve your game. Show your friends who the real star is. Climb to the top of the online Google Play leaderboard while you force their scores downwards! As you level up and improve your roster of characters you'll become unstoppable!

*** Funny Characters ***
There are tons of funny characters to unlock! Each one has their own unique ability. Deflect lasers as the sabre wielding space ninja or blast away alien after alien with smuggler's blaster sidearm. Each time you play your character will gain Experience Points moving you from level 1 to 2 to 3 and so on. Levelling up will unlock new characters with new abilities. Unlock all characters to complete your own unstoppable galactic force!

This is a super fun, lovingly crafted game. And best of all it's totally free!
Welcome to the world's crossy-est space wars shooter game!

description: Rover Builder GO is a unique physics based racing game. Build your own vehicle and win the competition!In the garage you can build any kinds of physically accurate rovers from the scratch. Only your creativity sets the limits. When the rover is built you're ready to go. Avoid scary ravines and climb over the hills as fast as you can.You are racing against other real players, trying to rise to the next division. Division rankings are shared every day so you need to stay sharp to climb to the top. As you succeed in the race you’ll get money to upgrade and buy new parts to your rover.Are you ready to compete in this cosmic race of crazy rovers?Internet connection required for full functionality.Follow Us:   * Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/roverbuilder/   * Web: https://www.roverbuilder.com/
descriptionHTML:
Rover Builder GO is a unique physics based racing game. Build your own vehicle and win the competition!

In the garage you can build any kinds of physically accurate rovers from the scratch. Only your creativity sets the limits. When the rover is built you're ready to go. Avoid scary ravines and climb over the hills as fast as you can.

You are racing against other real players, trying to rise to the next division. Division rankings are shared every day so you need to stay sharp to climb to the top. As you succeed in the race you’ll get money to upgrade and buy new parts to your rover.

Are you ready to compete in this cosmic race of crazy rovers?

Internet connection required for full functionality.


Follow Us:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/roverbuilder/
* Web: https://www.roverbuilder.com/

title: Rover Builder GO - Build, race, win!

comments: Okay. This game is VERY visually active, its beautiful, it really is. But there's too much going on. At least on the first (level?), like you cant tell what's coming at you too well. It's all trippy and wavy and lights and everything looks really good, but it almost completely obscures your vision. And I normally don't have problems with that. Ever. But this game man... Its almost not fair, the environment is surrounded with white and red shapes that just float through the air, coincidentally resembling the white squares and red poles that you're supposed to hit/avoid. All you see is a blur of red and white. Maybe you should hit it, maybe you shouldn't. Who the f*** knows...

This game is very amazing, and accurate with everything! The slopes, obstacles, color changes, and the points all seem accurate to any song. Like how it does work with any mp3. Small problems with songs with lyrics, but I do not listen to much of those anyways (I take that back there is no problem actually). It is amazing! I would really be appreciated if you made more styles AbstractArt! Great especially for a unity made mobile game.

When I clicked on the "Music" category, I was very bored. I was not expecting to find a game that perfectly combined my love for good music and video games. From playing mostly idle games and simulation games, this is by far my new favorite and boy am I surprised. I can't wait to throw my most interesting music in. Thank you for making this game.

I love how amazing it looks! I'd love of you added something to change the colors though, as the continuous orange hurts my eyes after a short while. This may sound a bit picky,  but would it be possible to make the game run 60 fps? The low setting runs the same as the high setting for me. Just wondering 🤣

Great. Beautiful menu score. Great levels. I would easily pay $50 for some more levels. Maybe a warrior lady riding a luck dragon from never ending story? Something oozing with 80's. Or a Tron cycle.  Tron like dragon in a flying level.  Please! But yeay this app eats up my time and is very therapeutic.

This game just broke my expectations. I expected another game that claims it adapts to the music and to the beat, but in the end it's just a crappy premade map. Damn I was wrong... I was amazed to see that it really was changing to the music. The art is just so fitting for retrowave music and it makes you fully experience it. The concept is simple, but interesting and it lets you enjoy the ride. I definetly recommend this game to anyone. My only problem is that it has too little content to buy with in-game currency, but it's understandable as it's a new game. I would love more maps, maybe more game modes and obviously more cars. Thanks to the creators of this awesome game. Good job guys.

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope– you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

comments: Game too difficult  The game is very stingy on gems and coins. You get so little on completing missions whilst upgrades demand huge amounts. I played the first three missions and i could only upgrade my armour to 1%. I mean subsequent missions demand you to purchase certain items to complete them but since you earn so little coins, you have to replay old missions many times before you can buy these items. I think the game was made for those who can purchase with cash online because, come on, unless you buy these. You'll sure have a difficult time earning them. It's very frustrating

I HATE that I'm forced to rate a great game so badly. The actual game is pretty awesome. I enjoy it and would have happily recommended it if only I'd gotten support when I made two purchases and never received either items. I wanted to support the developers, so I don't understand why they don't want to support their community. If you aren't going to pay to play however, GREAT GAME.

Nice The graphics are nice and the idea as well. If the horse didn't run at breakneck speed it might be possible to play. Only played for 10 mins on first tutorial level 1 and it's a nightmare to get all the controls right, especially at that speed. Gonna play more to see how things go.

Good game , nice graphics but little hard controls When more enemies ...and fire balls kill health very soon....improve these and will defenetly should become one of the best games...Nice music and sound effects,feels like ur really riding in a war zone of epic...thumbs up👍

Great game Good, fun time killer. Can become a little frustrating in difficulty when trying to earn money and gems to become strong enough to complete challenges. Melee can be a little clunky and hard to execute attacks when surrounded by enemies, and a button for switching weapons might be preferable to the double-click. However those are really the only flaws, and the positives of the game far outweigh them.

nice game, the control is hard just as how hard to ride a real horse while swing a sword. maybe make it a bit easy to get gym beside share score and getting money? and i wish that the difficulty can be reduce, such that some hard enemy will come out after how many kill or some range? at least, give us some tempo. and some skill to avoid arche rather then moving ur horse.
