A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

description: Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. Or, become a creator and write your own! <3Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. From your favorite movie titles like Mean Girls to fan faves such as Bad Boy’s Girl, Episode will keep you interacting for hours.With all your favorite genres, there’s no time like the present to fall in love, rise to fame, or solve a decade-old mystery. Better yet, join this incredible community and become a creator of your own - writing stories, amassing lots of fans along the way.Join our #episodesquad for #episodelife.FOLLOW US:instagram.com/episodefacebook.com/TheEpisodeAppTHE BELLAS ARE BACK and they’re getting into deep treble. Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?If you haven’t yet, start reading PRETTY LITTLE LIARS!- CREATE YOUR PERSONAL LOOK & choose your best outfits- EXPERIENCE THE SUSPENSE & uncover the mysterious “A”- FIND LOVE & decide your path to romanceOTHER FEATURED STORIES:MEAN GIRLS: SENIOR YEAR. description: Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is an exciting, FREE endless talking running game for boys and girls of all ages. Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest kittens in the world!😻Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Features 🙀- Dash, slide and jump to dodge obstacles and animals - don't talk!- Chase the rainbow and catch coins with the coin boost- Choose from 12 unique Kitty Cats, each with different accessories- Equip the rainbow shield to smash through obstacles!- Use a variety of exciting power ups to reach the high score- Unlock new upgrades, cats and boosts in the shop with your coins- Come back every day to complete tasks and earn exclusive rewards- Great graphics and performance- Free updates: New features and characters implemented regularlyChoose your favourite Kitty kitten and guide them through the forest and city as you try to collect as many coins as possible.Run, jump, dash and slide to dodge obstacles and keep your Tom kitty safe in this endless cat racing simulator game, where fast reactions will be required if you want to reach the highscore! Run, surf and slide for as long as you can to earn more points, and collect powerups to double your score! Will you be able to reach the high score in Tom Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten?In Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten once you and your cute kitty have collected enough coins, you will be able to chase the rainbow for a HUGE number of coins as the coin boost starts. Watch coins fall from the sky as you try to collect them all!After you have finished running in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten, you can visit the store where 12 kitties are waiting for you to unlock them. Try and collect exciting cats such as Tom, Salem the witches cat, Jess the post cat and even Princess, the most royal cat in the land! As well as Cats, you can upgrade your powerups, buy extra boosts or even purchase headstarts so that you can whizz straight to the front of the pack on your next run! Reaching the highscore is more possible than reaching the end of a ball of wool with all of these upgrades in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten!Subway trains, temple ruins and city streets can all be dangerous for a cute little kitty, so don’t forget to double tap the screen and activate the rainbow shield if you are going to crash! Smash through obstacles and collect extra coins for as long as it is active!Make sure to come back every day to complete daily tasks. These will allow you to earn exclusive and exciting rewards!  Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Racing has been carefully designed for boys, girls and families to have ultimate fun! descriptionHTML:
Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is an exciting, FREE endless talking running game for boys and girls of all ages. Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest kittens in the world!

😻Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Features 🙀
- Dash, slide and jump to dodge obstacles and animals - don't talk!
- Chase the rainbow and catch coins with the coin boost
- Choose from 12 unique Kitty Cats, each with different accessories
- Equip the rainbow shield to smash through obstacles!
- Use a variety of exciting power ups to reach the high score
- Unlock new upgrades, cats and boosts in the shop with your coins
- Come back every day to complete tasks and earn exclusive rewards
- Great graphics and performance
- Free updates: New features and characters implemented regularly

Choose your favourite Kitty kitten and guide them through the forest and city as you try to collect as many coins as possible.

Run, jump, dash and slide to dodge obstacles and keep your Tom kitty safe in this endless cat racing simulator game, where fast reactions will be required if you want to reach the highscore! Run, surf and slide for as long as you can to earn more points, and collect powerups to double your score! Will you be able to reach the high score in Tom Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten?

In Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten once you and your cute kitty have collected enough coins, you will be able to chase the rainbow for a HUGE number of coins as the coin boost starts. Watch coins fall from the sky as you try to collect them all!

After you have finished running in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten, you can visit the store where 12 kitties are waiting for you to unlock them. Try and collect exciting cats such as Tom, Salem the witches cat, Jess the post cat and even Princess, the most royal cat in the land!

As well as Cats, you can upgrade your powerups, buy extra boosts or even purchase headstarts so that you can whizz straight to the front of the pack on your next run! Reaching the highscore is more possible than reaching the end of a ball of wool with all of these upgrades in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten!

Subway trains, temple ruins and city streets can all be dangerous for a cute little kitty, so don’t forget to double tap the screen and activate the rainbow shield if you are going to crash! Smash through obstacles and collect extra coins for as long as it is active!

Make sure to come back every day to complete daily tasks. These will allow you to earn exclusive and exciting rewards!

Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Racing has been carefully designed for boys, girls and families to have ultimate fun!

Please rate us for future improvements and updates!

description: Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.List of safety tips:- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator- Stand straight facing the elevator's door- Press the button of the desired level- Keep the elevator neat and clean- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level- Stand still till the door is completely open- Prefer stairs in case of fireLift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Lift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game is designed specifically for kids.

description: Driving forestry machines is fun! Use harvester, logging truck and other machines, supply sawmill with timber. Try driving logging truck and Timber Harvester Simulator for a sawmill in our forestry machines simulator - it’s better than cutting real trees!Features of Timber Harvester Simulator:- Big forest full of timber- Variety of forestry machines- Forest logging missions- Realistic machines control and physics- Open world drivingRealistic machines!You have three types of forestry machines in the simulator - harvester, tow truck and logging truck. All machines have unique roles in forestry. Learn functions and ways of driving main forestry machines in our simulator - harvester, timber truck or tow truck are yours to play with. Every forestry truck type also has driving missions in the Timber Harvester Simulator - cut timber with harvester, deliver it with logging truck and complete other tasks.Forestry job!Driving big forestry machines like Timber Harvester Simulator and logging truck in our simulator is a man’s job! Get your truck and learn forestry machines driving tutorial in the simulator. Once you learn driving harvester, logging truck and other machines, do timber logging missions. The forest is full of job and timber, get to it!Big forest!Driving forestry machines, like logging truck or harvester will take to different locations for timber. Pass offroad locations on your truck to deliver and cut the timber. Don’t get lost while driving between sawmill and harvester sites. Explore different forestry locations in our simulator and do offroad truck delivery!Harvest all timber in the simulator of Timber Harvester Simulator - a simulator of forestry machines like harvester or timber truck!
descriptionHTML:
Driving forestry machines is fun! Use harvester, logging truck and other machines, supply sawmill with timber. Try driving logging truck and Timber Harvester Simulator for a sawmill in our forestry machines simulator - it’s better than cutting real trees!

Features of Timber Harvester Simulator:
- Big forest full of timber
- Variety of forestry machines
- Forest logging missions
- Realistic machines control and physics
- Open world driving

Realistic machines!
You have three types of forestry machines in the simulator - harvester, tow truck and logging truck. All machines have unique roles in forestry. Learn functions and ways of driving main forestry machines in our simulator - harvester, timber truck or tow truck are yours to play with. Every forestry truck type also has driving missions in the Timber Harvester Simulator - cut timber with harvester, deliver it with logging truck and complete other tasks.

Forestry job!
Driving big forestry machines like Timber Harvester Simulator and logging truck in our simulator is a man’s job! Get your truck and learn forestry machines driving tutorial in the simulator. Once you learn driving harvester, logging truck and other machines, do timber logging missions. The forest is full of job and timber, get to it!

Big forest!
Driving forestry machines, like logging truck or harvester will take to different locations for timber. Pass offroad locations on your truck to deliver and cut the timber. Don’t get lost while driving between sawmill and harvester sites. Explore different forestry locations in our simulator and do offroad truck delivery!

Harvest all timber in the simulator of Timber Harvester Simulator - a simulator of forestry machines like harvester or timber truck!
summary: Try forest harvester driving and timber truck in our forestry vehicle simulator!
title: Timber Harvester Simulator

You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. description: Welcome to the robots rescue mission game on the store. Superhero rescue game is an exclusive blend of US army superhero rescue games, flying hero games, superhero adventure & super power games. You are one of the best grand city heroes from action hero legend squad, go to the grand city and complete your challenging rescue mission and enjoy the superhero adventure. You are an iron hero with amazing super powers Jetpack at your back and great abilities like flying with the jetpack for speed and rescues. With the power of jetpack, you can fly to the open city. Use all your super power and marvellous strategy to save the people and city from the dangers in the city and shark animals in the surrounding sea. Superhero robot to help save the innocent people and fight against criminals in hit and run accidents with amazing flying and combat skills. You are a grand futuristic flying steel hero programmed to protect and guard the city. Fly over the grand city to the ultimate height for searching and rescuing people in an emergency situation and take them to the ambulance. Give a hard time to criminals escaping hit and run and arson in the grand city combating police officers.Your mission in Grand Iron Superhero Flying Robot Rescue Mission is to rise and fly over the grand city, find and save lives of the injured people waiting for help. The lives of grand city people are precious, ambulance or, police, firefighters won’t be able to reach in time so you need to take the responsibility of grand city rescue.fly The to an emergency situation. may be called at any time. Our grand super hero has raised the hopes of SWAT police officials as the crime rate will sure to decrease. It is a combination of super hero flying games and city survival games. Combining the strategy involved in strange hero games & thrills of rescue mission games, this hero simulator lets to take charge of the city by showcasing your superpowers. Grand Iron Superhero Flying Robot Rescue Mission Game is bound to make you an amazing hero to celebrate the identity as a ninja warrior, flying around the skyscrapers on a mission of city survival mission. For ultimate real survival mission, the city needs a flying superhero more like a mutant hero to live peacefully. This action thriller in ninja hero simulator will be more than some ninja warrior games or fun will be greater with city hero. Gangsters are active and criminal activities are at its peak.In the real futuristic battle of machines, the rescue mission is assigned to the grand flying robots. Be the iron hero and fight against the terrorist arson agencies, and help put the prisoners in Jail. Big 3D world of flying robot game is overwhelmed with a super robot hero that is on a total rampage to crush the whole 3D world of superhero games. Grand Iron Superhero Flying Robot Rescue Mission is a no task for an ordinary man. Life of a super amazing robot flying from one building to another at supersonic speed, rescue civilians and steel robot fighting crime; is a true Mayday thriller. Real flying adventure with the flying super robots over the grand city in action simulator game. Fly over huge skyscrapers and fly low to help the people in need. Be the flying cyborg and save the people from all evil to restore peace. Superheroes have special suits to help them in rescue missions & futuristic battle. Flying hero has the special suit with all metal mechanics.Grand Iron Superhero Flying Robot Rescue Mission Features:•	Realistic City Environment•	Superb Robot Icon Hero Flying Rescue Challenges•	Smooth & easy real Robot Controls•	Realistic Sound Effects•	Interesting Challenging level & Scenarios

descriptionHTML:
Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.
An addictive thrilling game “Scrolling Ball in Sky” landing on Google Play market now. The future door opens for you from the moment you tap on the screen.
The game features:
● Unique gameplay: help the balls rolling farther and farther away by swiping left or right.
● 3D scene design combined with rock music brings you addictive pleasure.
● Exciting levels: volcano scapes, city scape, desert scape, garden scape and rolling sky scape etc.!
● Fantastic balls: discover all the secrets it holds by rolling balls, or equips in rainbow shop.
● Invite your Facebook friends to challenge your unbeaten record!
Be attention to the roll ball story, you may get a chance to play spin wheel to obtain an unexpected surprise. Do not indulge in the game or you may costs 24 hours in rolling the balls. Very easy to play but very hard to reach the top records!
Scrolling Ball in Sky is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.
developerAddress: 126 Wood Duck Drive Watersmeet MI US
summary: Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.
title: Scrolling Ball in Sky: casual rolling game

Simple and intuitive, your baby will have lots of fun for hours! - Good for kids relaxing and crativity development
- Extremely easy-to-use for kids

- All coloring pages are for free!

Both, boys and girls will love this coloring book game for kids. In this coloring game you can find many types of fruits vegetables such as lemon, onion, mushroom and more.

Join fun and enjoy with this free game!

description: Hey Friends, Are you want to become a body piercer? If yes then show your skills in this Princess Piercing Artist Salon game and run your own virtual piercing shop. Here in this Piercing Artist Salon game, The beautiful princess need of a nose piercing, Tummy Piercing, Eyebrow Piercing, Ear Piercing and she select your Piercing salon to help pierce her nose, eyebrows, ear and tummy. Start by spa treatment for a smooth skin. Select your favourite body part where to place the piercing and use the piercing gun to place the jewelry. description: You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. Also in the game there are mini games that diversify the whole game process. For example, in one mini-game you have to climb up a large tree, avoiding spines. In another mini-game you have to work with different blocks to build a solid bridge and pass it.Good luck to you free game.
descriptionHTML:
You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.
In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.
Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.

descriptionHTML:
You are survivor on island. Try to live, find resources, craft different items!
You must beware of wild animals. If you want find food - explore big islands or hunt.
Make other items for survive - unlock new weapons and instruments! It help you to get more resources.

>> How to play <<
Find resources, break trees. See on indicator on down of screen, it show strongest of resource.

>> Craft system <<
Open craft menu. There you can find recipes. But some recipes are not available because you need resources for craft.

>> Building <<
Open backpack and select item. You can make a own house.

>> Hunting <<
Tap to action button. Beware of predators.

Survivor On Island features:
+ new big islands!
+ realistic survival simulator!
+ various resources!
+ different recipes!
+ hunting or fishing to get food!
+ cool 3d graphics!
+ weather!

Let's start exploration island!

comments: Good game, slightly annoying at times to control movement of the characters, tend to become awkward when trying to stay in straight line. Other than that is a good game to pass the time!

This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.

I can not get this game to work. It says 'Your hardware does not support this application'. This has happened with a few other fireman games. I have a new Sony XZ Premium phone so I don't understand why it won't work. Can anyone tell me if I can resolve this problem?

description: Want to serve humanity? Like rescue, action, driving and parking games? NY City Firefighter 2017 awaits!On a bright sunny day in New York City, you encounter a building in flames! You are a courageous firefighter, and your duty is to rescue your fellow New Yorkers. Are you up for the challenge?! Grab your hose and slap on your combat boots; fires don’t wait for anybody. NY City FireFighter includes brigade truck driving, parking, and action play. Race through city roads with your team in a quick fashion. Evade traffic and keep pedestrians safe. Use your parking skills to avoid clashing with city vehicles. Next, embark on several rescue missions in different locations. There will be shopping malls, banks, schools, office buildings, and even hospitals to rescue! Drive your fire truck to a HOT location and COOL it down! Locate fire points using your radar to rescue within given time and get maximum mission completion points. As you progress within the game, levels will become more interesting and challenging!NY City FireFighter 2017 Features:•Amazing visual and Cool sounds effects•Super thrilling Firefighter Missions to complete•Numbers of Firefighters Trucks and ambulances•New York City Environment with Cool 3D Graphics•Numbers of Animated People to Rescue•Smooth, Easy & Addictive GameplayAbout Tap2Play:Tap2Play, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tapinator, Inc.Tapinator Inc. description: Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer! RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron! *Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games *Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy *Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes! *Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider! *Challenge and compete with your friendsRun SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.
descriptionHTML:
Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer!

RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world
DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron!

*Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games
*Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy
*Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes!
*Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider!
*Challenge and compete with your friends

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.

Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.

A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.

A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.

A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.

descriptionHTML:
Play a fascinating dynamic first-person shooter with friends and other players online. Gather with friends in your team, create a clan and win together in dynamic battles.
Buy weapons, upgrade it, change the look of your weapons and character.

** Modes **

Game has more than 15 different game modes from which you can select:

- Team Deathmatch
- Death Run
- Gun Game
- Hunger Games

- Bunny Hop

** Maps **

More than 60 different maps, in which every day there are dynamic battles.
From small maps to a small group of friends, to large maps on which you have to work hard to win.

** Weapons **

More than 40 types of weapons like pistols, submachine guns, machine guns, shotguns, machine guns, rifles and melee weapons.

description: Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market! ----------------------------------------Game Features•	Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can! •	Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond! •	Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!•	Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).•	Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!•	Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!•	Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!•	Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!•	Complete contract missions to earn rewards.•	Can you unlock all of the achievements?----------------------------------------Adverts and Permissions•	Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!•	Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!•	Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!----------------------------------------With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!----------------------------------------Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.- Do not leave games playing overnight.----------------------------------------ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.- You must be aged 13+ to play.
descriptionHTML:
Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market!

----------------------------------------

Game Features

• Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can!

• Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond!

• Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!

• Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).

• Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!

• Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!

• Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!

• Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!

• Complete contract missions to earn rewards.

• Can you unlock all of the achievements?

----------------------------------------

Adverts and Permissions

• Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!

• Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!

• Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!

----------------------------------------

With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!

----------------------------------------

Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.

- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.
- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.
- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.
- Do not leave games playing overnight.

----------------------------------------
ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES

- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.

- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.

- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.

- You must be aged 13+ to play.

title: Dirt Inc.

comments: Great! You should definitely download this! I really love this game. The game is very simple yet fun. I have only been playing twist for a little but I'm already hooked. The only reason I rated this 4 stars Is because of the ads. There Is an ad about every four times you fail. These ads are very common in most Ketchapp games and they aren't that much of a bother.

Good time killer Once you get the hang of it, it's simple in theory, but still challenging. It's a really basic game with only limited things you can change, so once you've bought everything, you kind of just build up points, but it's good as a time killer. Ads are only once every few failures. Not the end of the world. And not laggy or too bright on my screen.

Fun And Perhaps Too Simple This is a very simple game. As in, one or two sound effects, no music at all, seven varying colors of blocks, and a blank background except for a spiral of never ending blocks. All of the fun is from the focus you give in one simple tap from not dying. I feel like there is some sort of depth perception problem, but that might just be me. The achievements and the different skins are minimalistic to say the least. However, for an arcade game, I give it a pass if you are into fast reaction types of games.

Pretty Decent Time Killer A pretty decent app with a few minor downsides. These mainly consist of adds that pop up when you're not expecting them, meaning you can accidentally click on them quite a bit. Other than that seems well optimised and it's very easy to loose hours to this game.

Nice Game but I have a few suggestions. I have bought all of the balls and floor colors and i'd like some more to buy especially because it's easy to get. Also if the little pink balls point/money thing could also have some design options than that would be great. I've read some reviews that says this game has too many ads but I personally haven't had any problem with ads. The amount of ads in this game is also found in other games so it's really nothing to complain about.

Still recommend something else With LOOOTTTSSS of patience and time,  you could get good. Problem is,  the levels would be that same over and over. I recommend something like geometry dash. It has lots of levels, full version has level  maker, also you can play other levels made by people, it's colorful and VERY ADDICTING, and last, it's more popular to ensure that there is always a level you can play, with people making them in level editor.

description: Mommy is out for her baby birth and you need to clean the bathroom. The bathroom should not be dirty as it is full of filth and germs. Hygiene is necessary so this game allows you to clean all the dirt and filth there is for a hygienic healthy life. The bathroom is very dirty and full of germs, and you’re the only one who can clean up all the mess. Even if you have the star girl princess Emma, she still has to clean the bathroom.There are a wide variety of cleaning tools available at your disposal so you have to select different tools and clean out the mess. In this fun filled game, you can clean the toilet by using a sponge and brush, making the toilet germs free. There are different scenes available that requires your help in cleaning them. Scenes include Toilet, shower, basin, tub and floor. The bathroom is a disaster so everything is out of its place and mommy’s going to be home very soon. It is your task to place objects at their places and make the bathroom clean and tidy before mom finds out about the mess. To make the game challenging and entertaining, mini games have been added to get the game going with fun. So don’t miss this game and be the best bathroom cleaner there is.Features:•	Clean your princess’s Emma Bathroom•	Quick shower scene cleaning, don’t let mommy find out•	Tub and Floor scene cleaning•	Place objects at their places and keep everything organized•	Mini games that you won’t find in any other bathroom clean up games

description: Wanna some pizza? Craft it! Time to become a cooking chef of an Italian restaurant. Cook your own food and serve your hungry customers to survive a real restaurant fever! Cooking, crafting & building!Enter the blocky world of cookingBecome a manager of a small bistro and try to stay in business. Start your exploration adventure in the kitchen, where cook delicious Italian food (pizza, spaghetti, gnocchi) or… some not-so-Italian burgers! Your customers are hungry and they won’t wait forever for their orders. Crafting and cooking isn’t as simple as in mama kitchen, but it’s an only way to become a cooking chef! Restaurant cooking games can be tiresome, but it’s not a tycoon. Cook like Sara, a famous Italian grandma, with Pizza Craft - the only simulator of an Italian chef cooking master!Endless pizza questYou can start your cooking adventure in a small bistro, but what’s better than crafting & building your own restaurant? Cook your own food like an Italian mama and serve new grill or veggie buffet. Adjust cooking chef strategy to please every customer in a hottest restaurant fever! Pizza Craft isn’t just another street food games where you control a fast food van or some other burger house. Here you can feel a passion of a real Italian cooking chef, because cooking, crafting & building possibilities are almost endless!CORE FEATURES:🍕 Endless crafting & building opportunities! It’s the best music tutor sigh reading app. Learn sight read music notes and learn to read music easily with this real piano.

description: The goal of this slide puzzle is simple: move blocks horizontally to create and clear full lines. It's free to play and easy to learn. Slidey Block Puzzle will keep you hooked from the first moment and you'll start enjoying the gameplay taste you've been missing.It will be a kind of nostalgia for who played classic arcade games like snake games, connect the dots games and blocks games on classic cell phones. Slidey's gameplay is simple just like those classic arcade and puzzle games, yet offers a fresh unique mechanic with gorgeous and cute graphic design.Enter the blocks world and get higher and higher scores with mind tricks. When the blocks are winking and waiting for you to unlock, the huge mouth of the gigantic monster is ready to swallow the block stack . Free your mind, relax and act wisely by dragging the blocks and making full brick rows. Slidey Block Puzzle is one of the trending games among the users who are searching a simple but original slide puzzle game.Why you'll love Slidey:● A new type of brain training puzzle, entertain your brain for minutes or for long hours● Endless challenge, you can play forever yet you'll still find something undiscovered● Earn Experience as you play. Rank up your cute shaman and get access to exciting shaman masks and gifts● An engaging original soundtrack with custom made sound effectsBOOSTERS help you when you're stuck in this mind game:CHARGER: Charges a block and clears its neighbor blocksCOLLECTOR: Collects and removes the blocks of the dominant color on boardSMASHER: Smashes and breaks large blocks into smaller piecesUse these boosters when you have a block stack and blocks get close to the monster mouth. You can't leave the phone when playing this block puzzle game just as playing classic snake games or connect dots, pipes or bricks games. Slidey is the most colorful and sparkling game among the free mind games. Everyone from all ages can solve challenging and brain-teasing block puzzles.Slidey: Block Puzzle is a highly polished addictive puzzle game where the fun is in trying to find short-term strategies and mind tricks to make the right move to blast blocks. We always love to hear from you. Please send us your feedback, we are truly listening: https://narhelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/newThanks for playing :)
descriptionHTML:
The goal of this slide puzzle is simple: move blocks horizontally to create and clear full lines. It's free to play and easy to learn. Slidey Block Puzzle will keep you hooked from the first moment and you'll start enjoying the gameplay taste you've been missing.

It will be a kind of nostalgia for who played classic arcade games like snake games, connect the dots games and blocks games on classic cell phones. Slidey's gameplay is simple just like those classic arcade and puzzle games, yet offers a fresh unique mechanic with gorgeous and cute graphic design.

Enter the blocks world and get higher and higher scores with mind tricks. When the blocks are winking and waiting for you to unlock, the huge mouth of the gigantic monster is ready to swallow the block stack . Free your mind, relax and act wisely by dragging the blocks and making full brick rows. Slidey Block Puzzle is one of the trending games among the users who are searching a simple but original slide puzzle game.

Why you'll love Slidey:
● A new type of brain training puzzle, entertain your brain for minutes or for long hours
● Endless challenge, you can play forever yet you'll still find something undiscovered
● Earn Experience as you play. Rank up your cute shaman and get access to exciting shaman masks and gifts
● An engaging original soundtrack with custom made sound effects

BOOSTERS help you when you're stuck in this mind game:
CHARGER: Charges a block and clears its neighbor blocks
COLLECTOR: Collects and removes the blocks of the dominant color on board
SMASHER: Smashes and breaks large blocks into smaller pieces

Use these boosters when you have a block stack and blocks get close to the monster mouth. You can't leave the phone when playing this block puzzle game just as playing classic snake games or connect dots, pipes or bricks games. Slidey is the most colorful and sparkling game among the free mind games. Everyone from all ages can solve challenging and brain-teasing block puzzles.

Slidey: Block Puzzle is a highly polished addictive puzzle game where the fun is in trying to find short-term strategies and mind tricks to make the right move to blast blocks. We always love to hear from you. Please send us your feedback, we are truly listening: https://narhelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thanks for playing :)

comments: I don't see what's so great about this game. All you do is run around, kill people, and collect coins. I'm seeing all these reviews saying "great game bad controls," and I'm convinced that they're fake accounts created by the devs. The game sucks and holds no substance, but the controls are just fine. I've played the "updated" version, but it's the exact same thing; run around, kill things, and collect coins.

It is no longer usable.  Very disappointing.  His tablet is less than two months old.

description: Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS is a game trying to portray a story of an army commando whose mission was to save his nation from all the evil eyes. Our mission is to take all those responsibilities which are used to be fulfilled by a commando hero. It makes you feel like a  sniper. Fight with enemies as the mighty Warrior, crush them with the Gunner Shots and rain down fire upon them as the Hellfire, or charge them down as the imposing Gunner Combatant. The game features multiple interesting levels with immersive environments and landscapes. The game uses latest 3D development technologies to provide you the best gaming experience on mobile devices.The main part of this game is that this game is an action packed frontline war game. Shoot and kill your enemies with modern techniques of 2017. This simulator is full of exciting levels. It is having multiple levels.  And in order to get into the next level you have to fulfill the task before specific time duration given in every stage. And every stage itself is having some tasks full of excitement.   Fight like a commando and make your fellows safe from being killed and extreme fear. If you survive till end than you will be given more rewards and bonus counts after you try to run from this evil mania. Download this Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS now and start your exciting journey to win all the missions. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist.Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS is a shooting where you will fight in with your enemies in every stage. Futuristic environment of this game will take you to the real world of warfare. This game will make you remember your childhood memories of playing an action packed fighting simulator.  It’s a free game with a bunch of missions. We wish you once again to have a great time. The main thing about this game is that it’s free of cost you just have to download it by a single tap. Come! Let’s have a battle with enemies. Let’s start this game.   Key features for Anti-Terrorist SWAT Team FPS :  • Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics• Amazing 3D indoor environment• Easy and fun to play• Interesting Game Play• Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics• Multiple challenging levels

description: Create your own herd, take part in magic adventures and fight for survival in a fantasy land. Animal life is tough, but captivating in our animals survival simulator. Try to live a horse life in a magic fairy land and survive in its nature!Horse Family: Fantasy Survival Features:CRAZY ADVENTURES - Complete ridiculous and epic quests, have fun in the fairy tale OPEN MAGIC WORLD - Forests and castles, dragons and peasants, so much to find and meet!YOUR OWN HERD - Take care of an entire family of horses in the survival simulatorSURVIVAL MODE - How long can you last in this world full of magic creatures and dangers?Ride with your herd!You’re not alone in this dangerous magic world! Find other horse, create a family and breed foals - make your horse stronger to have a bigger family. Strength is numbers - you won’t last long alone in fantasy world full trolls, dragons and other dangers of survival simulator!Survive in the wild!Nature of fantasy land is full with magic dwellers! From humans and chicken to unicorns and dragons - find friends and enemies as you complete quests or roam the magic world with your herd. And seek food and water to stay strong and healthy. Take the challenge of the wild and survive in dangerous magic world!Take part in adventures!All sorts of fantastic stuff happen in the fairy land! Take part in fights with dragons and villagers’ affairs, deal with crazy sorcerers and animals. Quests and magic adventures await, plunge into fairy tale with our horse survival simulator!Ride through the fantasy kingdom with your horse herd in Horse Family: Fantasy Survival!
descriptionHTML:
Create your own herd, take part in magic adventures and fight for survival in a fantasy land. Animal life is tough, but captivating in our animals survival simulator. Try to live a horse life in a magic fairy land and survive in its nature!

Horse Family: Fantasy Survival Features:

CRAZY ADVENTURES - Complete ridiculous and epic quests, have fun in the fairy tale

OPEN MAGIC WORLD - Forests and castles, dragons and peasants, so much to find and meet!

YOUR OWN HERD - Take care of an entire family of horses in the survival simulator

SURVIVAL MODE - How long can you last in this world full of magic creatures and dangers?

Ride with your herd!
You’re not alone in this dangerous magic world! Find other horse, create a family and breed foals - make your horse stronger to have a bigger family. Strength is numbers - you won’t last long alone in fantasy world full trolls, dragons and other dangers of survival simulator!

Survive in the wild!
Nature of fantasy land is full with magic dwellers! From humans and chicken to unicorns and dragons - find friends and enemies as you complete quests or roam the magic world with your herd. And seek food and water to stay strong and healthy. Take the challenge of the wild and survive in dangerous magic world!

Take part in adventures!
All sorts of fantastic stuff happen in the fairy land! Take part in fights with dragons and villagers’ affairs, deal with crazy sorcerers and animals. Quests and magic adventures await, plunge into fairy tale with our horse survival simulator!

Ride through the fantasy kingdom with your horse herd in Horse Family: Fantasy Survival!
summary: Come to the world of trolls and dragons and try to survive... as a horse!
title: Horse Family: Fantasy Survival - live a fairy tale

descriptionHTML:
What do you know about the Middle Ages?
What games inspire you?

The Middle Ages and the Renaissance are the brightest periods in the history of mankind. This era was referred to exclusively as "dark ages", where ignorance, inquisition and barbarism dominated. But it was also a time of romance, of great discoveries and fine works of art.

Create your own empire that will stand the test of time! Build medieval castles and develop medieval settlements.

Explore ruins, villages and look for architectural wonders. Build a unique settlement for your own project. Fight against other players from all over the world and shoulder to shoulder with them.

Discover new technologies:
- Explore new materials.
- Invent new weapons.
- Develop trade for the rapid growth of its economy.

Functions:
- Build and expand the kingdom with farms, careers and many others.
"Manage your property."
- Make a battle with other players in real time.
- Use a cross platform to always stay in the game and have more opportunities.

Requirements:
• Android 4.1 or higher.
• 1 GB of RAM is recommended.
• Internet connection.

Create your own kingdom. Conquer new territories to expand your kingdom and defeat the formidable rivals and other players in the epic battles.

The new improved 3D graphics will help you take full advantage of the graphics capabilities. Many aspects of the game are unique in this genre.

PLEASE NOTE:
Medieval Craft: My Exploration is a free game. Download and enjoy the unique features that are given to you. In addition, in accordance with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years old to play or download Medieval Craft: My Exploration.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  🤗😠👍

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

Ultimate bowling 2014 This is by far one of the better bowling games I have ran across in very long time. You have more choices when it comes to the bowling balls, better control of the ball as you are sending it down the lane, I could go on but the one thing I would like to see change would be for you to show the pins like they do in real bowling that have gone down on your first shot like off to the side somewhere. This would make it even more realistic, otherwise I can't find a thing wrong so far with the game..hope you enjoy

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..

comments: Downloaded this through another app (free golden eagles) where if you downloaded and played this game, and got castle to level 10 would be rewarded. Sent off request to support a number of times with proof and no reply, and after a week still no reward.   So if you are downloading this to get reward from another app don't bother as you won't get it

Waste of time. I started playing the game as an offer to get points for another game. Vikings is not a bad game on itself but I feel cheated when I'm promised something and IronSource does not honor their part of the bargain. IronSource said the Plarium did not verify my completion of the offer, so I won't play it anymore nor try other Plarium content nor IronSource advertised games. The actual content is fine, but the business practices are deplorable.

Great time killer, I love the interaction and concept of the game. It can get a bit laggy at times and at it's worst, it will crash on you. The wait times are unbearable though. No ads at all since the first time I played too!

Too late to join this game. As soon as you lose your newbie protection you become a farm for higher level players, preventing you from progressing. Every morning you find all your resources pillaged and your troops dead or incapacitated. Maybe I'm just in the wrong timezone.

The game has the same problems as the other versions. The events boost strong players which makes the gap in strength larger. The premium items are overpriced. Probably the worst I have seen, there is no protection for your silver. This means stronger players always have a reason to attack someone weaker and there is no protection in place after being successfully attacked.

The game itself is great. Zero complaints there. But the fact that it I am unable to ever log in is infuriating. I've literally been zeroed out because the app won't let me log in... multiple times. It's absolutely ridiculous. Needs to be fixed.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the ruthless world of Vikings, where freedom, power, fear and violence reign supreme! Become the leader of a large army, lead your troops to victory and prove that you are the mightiest conqueror among a million players.

Try on the role of a wise and courageous Jarl, respected and feared by all! Construct magnificent buildings, take part in victorious campaigns, train your valiant warriors and boost your coffers. The superb graphics, compelling story and dynamic battles will have you hooked from the moment you start playing!

Features:
✔ Stunning graphics
✔ Free to play
✔ Numerous troop classes
✔ Multiple language options
✔ Fierce and thrilling battles with players from all over the world
✔ Handsome rewards for completing a variety of quests and tasks
✔ Weapons and gear crafting
✔ Become the leader or member of a mighty Clan

NOTE: Vikings: War of Clans is completely free to play, but has optional in-app purchases for real currency. You can turn off this option or set a password in your device settings. You will need an internet connection to play.

Vikings: War of Clans is an exciting MMORTS with players all over the globe. We are constantly improving gameplay and introducing exciting new updates for you. Feel free to share your ideas and suggestions — together we’ll make the Viking world even more enthralling!

You are a Viking! You are the Hero!

description: Switch your car to the boat, jet or even a windsurfing board in this new Jet Racing game! Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your ship with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and dives on it's way. This game can be played by the whole family! Invite your family and play together!Prepare for a race by picking one of the fast sailing rides! Gain enough speed to jump over the ramps or dive deep into the ocean. You will love all the surprises in each level (you can even meet dolphins here)! There are also plenty of coins to collect for better results while sailing for the win! Lets start the engine or catch the wind and swim to the finish in the shortest time possible! The controls are so simple that anyone can play this game without any problems!The levels are designed so that you would do many stunts on the run, the ship will spin doing flips - but watch out not to land on the roof! You will quickly learn that this speed jet boat game is crazy and full of laugh-generating moments. Try yourself!

comments: So lovely! Good game. You can easily make money and food, breeding and nurturing are pretty fast, unlike other games where you'd have to wait 24 hours or more for things to be done. Interactions with dogs are amazing, thet do so many tricks! I do have some issues with notifications (as in , I never get any ) and the packs; the game freezes completely when I take free or daily packs and sometimes when I restart the game I don't get the bonus from the packs at all.. And I was never able to watch videos for free packs.That is sad, but other than that this game really deserves 5 stars.

I got this game a couple of weeks ago and with the newest update, I can't do anything. Any time I try to click on a dog, the oven to get food, or anywhere, nothing happens. It's frustrating and I don't want to get rid of this game. Fix this problem please, I am too far in this game to restart.
Really like the game but the spin wheel is a joke. Total waste of gems getting the same result each time you try again. Impossible to get more than a 2 star dog. Getting annoyed! Seems rigged to me!

The game itself is fun and i like it, but its way to hard to get tokens to buy dog cards. Especially when one dog card can cost 1,000 or more tokens. Right now I'm stuck in the main quests because i can't level my dogs up enough because I can't get enough tokens without paying real money.
Its an awesome game. Way better than i expected. So easy to earn things and breed etc. The only problem i got right now is that it wont load for some reason. But will keep trying
Very Good. I like it. But please fix one thing. Zooming in while petting the dog 🐕 :3 Thanks!
description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies! Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES★ Gorgeous 3D environment! ★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES● Interaction with the dogs● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)● More dogs and decorations● Backyard / Minigames ● Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com
descriptionHTML:
Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.

In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies!
Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!

Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!

FEATURES
★ Gorgeous 3D environment!
★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior!
★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!
★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!
★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!
★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!

PLEASE NOTE!
This game is still in early development.
And a network connection is required.

UPCOMING FEATURES
● Interaction with the dogs
● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)
● More dogs and decorations
● Backyard / Minigames
● Dog dressup and competition with friends
Upcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman, Bull Terrier, Pomeranian, Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.

descriptionHTML:
★Dynamic 3D FPS.
★Enthralling gameplay with multiple quests and endless fights.

For centuries you were lying deep in the darkness as a piece of iron ore deep inside the mountains. But people mined you and made a part of a car.
You are awake now. But not only you. Thousands of robots like you are now in the city. And it’s up to you to decide what to do.
Will you be an ally of humanity or it’s worst enemy.
Wake up as a steel machine ready for war!

description: Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft! Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper! Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design  items to make the most unique interior design ever!Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant! Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala! Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a  french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!Craft & BuildSimply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!Play MinigamesPlay minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you! Meet the peopleUse internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend! Explore the infinite worldYou can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!Become an interior and exterior designerUse one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design! Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!
descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Meet the people
Use internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Crafting, building & exploration of Paris, the city of art & love! Creative game
title: Paris Craft: Exploration of City of Love & Art

descriptionHTML:
Adopt and take care of super cute and furry kittens with pet vet Chloe!

Sweet Baby Girl Chloe loves animals and helps to take care of little kittens in the Sweet Baby Girl Cat Shelter. Join her and have tons of furry fun! Mr. Fluffy is really hungry, precious little Snowflake is waiting for a bath, snuggly Whiskers needs eye doctor help and adventurous Oliver has a broken tail. Don't forget to clean up the cat shelter with pet vet Chloe!

Sweet Baby Girl Cat Shelter kitten care games for kids and toddlers:
· Play and take care of four little kittens: Mr. Fluffy, Snowflake, Whiskers and Oliver!
· Feed Mr. Fluffy - cook the most delicious fish with pet vet Chloe!
· Give Snowflake a bath - shower, shampoo, dry and comb her soft white fur, then trim and color the claws!
· Dress up Snowflake - choose the cutest collar and stylish kitty cat accessories!
· Treat Oliver's broken tail - use the X-ray machine, fix the tail and help Olive feel much better!
· Play cat eye doctor and treat Whiskers' eyes - he needs new glasses!
· Clean up with pet vet Chloe - wipe, sweep, polish, vacuum, change the litter box and throw away the trash!
· Collect super cute kitten stickers and watch videos for kids!


ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they really love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

comments: Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

The reason for my lower rating is simply because it's available on the android TV store, I can use a mouse to navigate the interface, but I cannot map the controls to the Nvidia shield gamepad, the inbuilt mapper doesn't recognize most buttons including thumb stick for steering. It effectively makes this game unplayable on the Nvidia shield.

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down tho😂 Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developers😊🙏 Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.
